original: ba na ti dang ta no ti sogs dang aita bkag pa rnams kyi ti ka pha rol la lnga pa dbyi bar 'gyur ba'ang ma yin zhing ring por yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ba na ti dang ta no ti sogs dang aita bkag pa rnams kyi ti ka pha rol la lnga pa dbyi bar 'gyur ba'ang ma yin zhing ring por yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The t of banti, tanoti, etc., and the t of the prohibited etad, is not elided before a following p, nor does it become long.

original: banti / tanti /
analyzed: banti / tanti /
translated: Banti, tanti.🔽Yanti.

original: yanti / gus par gyis shig / rgyas par gyis shig /
analyzed: yanti / gus par gyis shig / rgyas par gyis shig /
translated: Be devoted! Be extensive!

original: sdom par gyis shig ces ti ka kri ta dag mid la'ang zhes ti ka'o //
analyzed: sdom par gyis shig ces ti ka kri ta dag mid la'ang zhes ti ka'o //
translated: Be restrained! The t of tika is elided in the imperative.

original: au ndi'i ma la'o //
analyzed: au ndi'i ma la'o //
translated: The u of unati.

original: aundi 'drul ba la'o zhes pa 'di'i lnga pa dbyi bar 'gyur te man pha rol la'o //
analyzed: aundi 'drul ba la'o zhes pa 'di'i lnga pa dbyi bar 'gyur te man pha rol la'o //
translated: The u of unati, which means to be loose, is elided before a following p.

original: aadmo / mana\'o zhes pas mana\'o //
analyzed: aadmo / mana\'o zhes pas mana\'o //
translated: Admo, man'o.

original: lnga pa dbyi'o au pa dh'a'i yon tan no //
analyzed: lnga pa dbyi'o au pa dh'a'i yon tan no //
translated: The p of upadhi, which means quality, is elided.

original: ma ning las si aa mra dag gi zhes pas si dbyi'o //
analyzed: ma ning las si aa mra dag gi zhes pas si dbyi'o //
translated: The s of asis, which means the fruit of the mango tree, is elided.

original: aindhi'i ghanya @262b la'o ;
analyzed: aindhi'i ghanya @262b la'o ;
translated: The g of ghana of indhi.

original: / nyi aindhi 'bar ba la'o zhes pa 'di'i lnga pa dbyi bar 'gyur te ghanya pha rol la'o //
analyzed: / nyi aindhi 'bar ba la'o zhes pa 'di'i lnga pa dbyi bar 'gyur te ghanya pha rol la'o //
translated: The p of indhi, which means to burn, is elided before a following gha.🔽Edha.

original: aedha:/ 'dis 'bar byed do zhes pa gsal byed mtha' las kyang zhes pas ghanya'o //
analyzed: aedha:/ 'dis 'bar byed do zhes pa gsal byed mtha' las kyang zhes pas ghanya'o //
translated: This means to burn. The gha is elided by the rule: “Also from the final of a verbal root.”

original: syanda rgyug pa la'o //
analyzed: syanda rgyug pa la'o //
translated: syandhu to flow.

original: syandhu 'dzag pa la'o zhes pa 'di'i ghanyam pha rol la lnga pa dbyi bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: syandhu 'dzag pa la'o zhes pa 'di'i ghanyam pha rol la lnga pa dbyi bar 'gyur te /
translated: In this [word], the fifth of gnyaṃ is elided in the sense of the other [word].

original: rgyug pa'i don la'o //
analyzed: rgyug pa'i don la'o //
translated: In the sense of to flow.

original: rgyug pa ni shugs so //
analyzed: rgyug pa ni shugs so //
translated: Flow is speed.🔽syad

original: syad:/ dngos po la ghanya'o //
analyzed: syad:/ dngos po la ghanya'o //
translated: gnyaṃ in the sense of thing.

original: lnga pa dbyi'o //
analyzed: lnga pa dbyi'o //
translated: The fifth is elided.

original: aa'i au ba dh'a zhes pas ring por mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: aa'i au ba dh'a zhes pas ring por mi 'gyur te /
translated: By āi ubhā, it is not lengthened.

original: ming snga ma can gyi cho ga ni rtag gu ma yin no zhes pa'i tshig gi phyig ro //
analyzed: ming snga ma can gyi cho ga ni rtag gu ma yin no zhes pa'i tshig gi phyig ro //
translated: The rule of the former name is not always so.

original: rgyug pa la zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: rgyug pa la zhes pa ci zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning of in the sense of to flow?

original: tee la sya syanda:/
analyzed: tee la sya syanda:/
translated: telasya syand🔽gnyaṃ.

original: ghanya'o // 'dzag pa'o zhes pa'i don to /
analyzed: ghanya'o // 'dzag pa'o zhes pa'i don to /
translated: The meaning is to flow.

original: ranydza'i dngos po dang byed pa dag la'o ;
analyzed: ranydza'i dngos po dang byed pa dag la'o ;
translated: In the sense of thing and action.

original: ranydza'i lnga pa dbyi bar dngos po dang byed pa'i don dag la 'gyur te /
analyzed: ranydza'i lnga pa dbyi bar dngos po dang byed pa'i don dag la 'gyur te /
translated: The fifth of rñā is elided in the sense of thing and action.

original: ghanya pha rol tu byas pa la'o //🔽ra ga:/ tshos pa'o zhes pas dngos po la ghanya'o //
analyzed: ghanya pha rol tu byas pa la'o // ra ga:/ tshos pa'o zhes pas dngos po la ghanya'o //
translated: gnyaṃ is made into the other [word].🔽raṅga🔽gnyaṃ in the sense of thing.

original: tsa dza dag gi ka kha dag go zhes pas ga'o //
analyzed: tsa dza dag gi ka kha dag go zhes pas ga'o //
translated: By ca and ja are ka and kha, it is ga.

original: byed pa la /
analyzed: byed pa la /
translated: In the sense of action.

original: r'ag:/ 'dis tshos bya'o zhes pa gsal byed las kyang ngo zhes pas ghanya'o //
analyzed: r'ag:/ 'dis tshos bya'o zhes pa gsal byed las kyang ngo zhes pas ghanya'o //
translated: This is the causative.  By the affix also, i.e. by the affix ghañ.

original: dngos po dang byed pa dag la zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: dngos po dang byed pa dag la zhes pa ci zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning of in the case of a thing and an agent?

original: ram ga:/ 'dir tshos byed pa'o byed pa'o zhes pa snga ma bzhin ghanya'o //
analyzed: ram ga:/ 'dir tshos byed pa'o byed pa'o zhes pa snga ma bzhin ghanya'o //
translated: ram ghañ.  Here, the causative is the agent, as before. ghañ.

original: busha dang ghi ni na dag la'ang ngo //
analyzed: busha dang ghi ni na dag la'ang ngo //
translated: It is also in the case of bus and ghañ.

original: ranydzi las zhes pa kho na'o //
analyzed: ranydzi las zhes pa kho na'o //
translated: From rñja, i.e. only.

original: busha dang ghi ni na pha rol la ranydza las lnga pa dbyi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: busha dang ghi ni na pha rol la ranydza las lnga pa dbyi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In the case of bus and ghañ, the fifth, i, is elided in the case of the object.

original: ra dza ka:/ 'tshed pa 'di bzo bo yin pa zhes bzo bo la busha'o //
analyzed: ra dza ka:/ 'tshed pa 'di bzo bo yin pa zhes bzo bo la busha'o //
translated: rañjakah.  This cooking is the agent, i.e. in the case of the agent, bus.

original: sha yig ni sha ta rjes su 'brel ba zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: sha yig ni sha ta rjes su 'brel ba zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The syllable śa has the meaning of connected with śat.

original: yu bu dzha rnams kyi zhes pas aa ka ru bsgyur ro //
analyzed: yu bu dzha rnams kyi zhes pas aa ka ru bsgyur ro //
translated: By in the case of yuj, the ak is changed to ru.

original: ghi ni na la ni /
analyzed: ghi ni na la ni /
translated: In the case of ghañ,🔽rag gi.

original: rag gi / yu dza ru dza bha dza bhudza zhes pas ghi ni na'o //
analyzed: rag gi / yu dza ru dza bha dza bhudza zhes pas ghi ni na'o //
translated: yuj, ruj, bhaj, bhuj, i.e. ghañ.

original: na yig ni ai tsa bzhin 'gyur ba'i don no //
analyzed: na yig ni ai tsa bzhin 'gyur ba'i don no //
translated: The syllable na has the meaning of change like ica.

original: ai yig ni brjod pa'i don to //
analyzed: ai yig ni brjod pa'i don to //
translated: The syllable i has the meaning of expression.

original: gha yig ni tsa dza dag gi ka ga dag go zhes ba'i don to //
analyzed: gha yig ni tsa dza dag gi ka ga dag go zhes ba'i don to //
translated: The letter ga is the ka and ga of ca and ja.

original: brim hi'i ait min pa'i dbyangs la yang na'o //
analyzed: brim hi'i ait min pa'i dbyangs la yang na'o //
translated: The augment na is also for a vowel that is not i or u.

original: bri hi 'phel ba la'o zhes pa 'di'i lnga pa dbyi bar yang na 'gyur te aita min pa'i dbyangs pha rol la'o //
analyzed: bri hi 'phel ba la'o zhes pa 'di'i lnga pa dbyi bar yang na 'gyur te aita min pa'i dbyangs pha rol la'o //
translated: The augment i is for the augment of brihi, which means “to increase,” when the fifth vowel is elided, or for a vowel that is not i or u.🔽brihaḥ

original: barha ka:/ bri ha ka:/🔽bri hi 'phel ba la'o //
analyzed: barha ka:/ bri ha ka:/ bri hi 'phel ba la'o //
translated: brihaḥ

original: ai yig ni na yig a'a ga ma'i don no //
analyzed: ai yig ni na yig a'a ga ma'i don no //
translated: The letter i is the letter na with the superscript a.

original: ai ta rjes su 'brel pa ma yin pa zhes pa'i shes par byed pa las na a'a ga ma'o //
analyzed: ai ta rjes su 'brel pa ma yin pa zhes pa'i shes par byed pa las na a'a ga ma'o //
translated: The letter i is the superscript a because of the statement “not connected with i.”

original: 'phel par byed do zhes pas buna'o //
analyzed: 'phel par byed do zhes pas buna'o //
translated: The augment u is because of the statement “it increases.”

original: yang na lnga pa dbyi'o //
analyzed: yang na lnga pa dbyi'o //
translated: Or the fifth vowel is elided.

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: Similarly,🔽brihanam

original: barha nam / yut 'ang ngo zhes pas yuta'o //
analyzed: barha nam / yut 'ang ngo zhes pas yuta'o //
translated: yutam

original: dbyangs las zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: dbyangs las zhes pa ci zhe na /
translated: What is meant by “from a vowel”?🔽brimhat

original: brim ha te /
analyzed: brim ha te /
translated: yan

original: yana'o // ait min pa la zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: yana'o // ait min pa la zhes pa ci zhe na /
translated: What is meant by “not i or u”?

original: brim hi t'a /
analyzed: brim hi t'a /
translated: brimhatam🔽tricaḥ

original: tri tsa'o // aita'o //
analyzed: tri tsa'o // aita'o //
translated: iḥ🔽brihaḥ

original: briha / brim ha 'phel ba'o zhes pa byings gnyis kyi sbyor ba @263a * //
analyzed: briha / brim ha 'phel ba'o zhes pa byings gnyis kyi sbyor ba @263a * //
translated: brimhaḥ

original: rnams grub pa nyid phyir sbyor ba brtsam par mi bya'o zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rnams grub pa nyid phyir sbyor ba brtsam par mi bya'o zhes gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, one should not undertake an action.

original: ya mi ma ni ta mi ga ma rnams kyi kvipala'o //
analyzed: ya mi ma ni ta mi ga ma rnams kyi kvipala'o //
translated: The kvip augment is added to the ya, ma, na, ta, mi, ga, ma.

original: ya mi ma ni ta mi ga ma zhes pa 'di rnams lnga pa dbyi bar 'gyur te kvip pha rol la'o //
analyzed: ya mi ma ni ta mi ga ma zhes pa 'di rnams lnga pa dbyi bar 'gyur te kvip pha rol la'o //
translated: The five ya, ma, na, ta, mi are elided, and kvip is added to the other.

original: sam ya ta /🔽pa r'i mata /
analyzed: sam ya ta / pa r'i mata /
translated: samyata🔽parimata

original: pa r'i ta ta /
analyzed: pa r'i ta ta /
translated: paritata

original: gra ma ga ta /
analyzed: gra ma ga ta /
translated: kramāgata

original: yang dag par sdom par byed do ;
analyzed: yang dag par sdom par byed do ;
translated: binds

original: / yongs su shes par byed do //
analyzed: / yongs su shes par byed do //
translated: knows completely

original: yongs su rgyas par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su rgyas par byed do //
translated: expands

original: grong du 'gro bar byed do zhes pas kvipa'o //🔽lnga pa phyis pa na byings kyi ta mtha'o //
analyzed: grong du 'gro bar byed do zhes pas kvipa'o // lnga pa phyis pa na byings kyi ta mtha'o //
translated: goes to the village🔽The long vowel is added to the root, and the fifth is elided.

original: pa ri'i sgra'i thung ngu'i ring po'o zhes pas ring po'o //
analyzed: pa ri'i sgra'i thung ngu'i ring po'o zhes pas ring po'o //
translated: The short vowel is lengthened.

original: bita ban dag la a'a'o //
analyzed: bita ban dag la a'a'o //
translated: The augment a is added to the kvip.

original: lnga pa zhes pa kho na'o //
analyzed: lnga pa zhes pa kho na'o //
translated: The fifth is elided.

original: lnga pa'i aa nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: lnga pa'i aa nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: The fifth becomes a.

original: bita dang ban pha rol la'o ;
analyzed: bita dang ban pha rol la'o ;
translated: The kvip is added to the other.🔽durakṣāḥ

original: / du rkr'a:/ aa greg:/
analyzed: / du rkr'a:/ aa greg:/
translated: agrakāḥ

original: kra mu rkang pa rnam par 'god pa la'o //
analyzed: kra mu rkang pa rnam par 'god pa la'o //
translated: kramur

original: gamli 'gro ba la'o //
analyzed: gamli 'gro ba la'o //
translated: gamya

original: dur aa gra'i sgra dag sngon ma'o //
analyzed: dur aa gra'i sgra dag sngon ma'o //
translated: The former sound of the word “grave” (gati).

original: ring por skyed par byed do//
analyzed: ring por skyed par byed do//
translated: It causes the lengthening.

original: rtse mor 'gro bar byed do zhes pas bita'o //
analyzed: rtse mor 'gro bar byed do zhes pas bita'o //
translated: It causes the going to the top (of the head).

original: kra mi ga mi kha mi zhes pas badi'o //
analyzed: kra mi ga mi kha mi zhes pas badi'o //
translated: It is the sound of the word “grave” (gati).

original: ta yig ni 'di'i don no ai yig ni brjod pa'i don no //
analyzed: ta yig ni 'di'i don no ai yig ni brjod pa'i don no //
translated: The letter ta is the meaning of this. The letter i is the meaning of the expression.

original: sbyar ba min pa'i ba'i dbyi'o zhes pas ba dbyi'o //
analyzed: sbyar ba min pa'i ba'i dbyi'o zhes pas ba dbyi'o //
translated: The sound of the letter va that is not combined.

original: 'dis a'a nyid do //
analyzed: 'dis a'a nyid do //
translated: This is the letter a itself.

original: du rk'a b'a /
analyzed: du rk'a b'a /
translated: The letter du is the sound of the letter ra.

original: aa gre g'a b'a /
analyzed: aa gre g'a b'a /
translated: The letter a is the sound of the letter ga.

original: kra mi gmi dag las manni kva ni pa ba ni pa yang ngo zhes pas ba nipa\'o //
analyzed: kra mi gmi dag las manni kva ni pa ba ni pa yang ngo zhes pas ba nipa\'o //
translated: From the letters kra and mi, the letter na is the sound of the letter pa.

original: a'a nyid do //🔽kha ni sa ni dza ni rnams kyi dhuta la'o //
analyzed: a'a nyid do // kha ni sa ni dza ni rnams kyi dhuta la'o //
translated: This is the letter a itself.🔽The letter kha is the sound of the letters sa, ni, and ja.

original: khu nu nges par 'joms pa la'o //
analyzed: khu nu nges par 'joms pa la'o //
translated: The letter khu is the sound of the letter dh.

original: sha nu sbyin pa la'o //🔽dzan skye ba la'o //
analyzed: sha nu sbyin pa la'o // dzan skye ba la'o //
translated: The letter sha is the sound of the letter nu.🔽The letter ja is the sound of the letter jña.

original: dza n'i skyed pa la'o zhes pa yang na'o //
analyzed: dza n'i skyed pa la'o zhes pa yang na'o //
translated: The letter ja is the sound of the letter jña.

original: 'di rnams kyi dhuta pha rol la a'a nyid du 'gyur ro //🔽kh'a t'a:/ kh'a ta b'at /🔽s'at:/ s'a ta b'a ta /
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi dhuta pha rol la a'a nyid du 'gyur ro // kh'a t'a:/ kh'a ta b'at / s'at:/ s'a ta b'a ta /
translated: The letter dh of these is the letter a in the case of the other.🔽The letter kha is the sound of the letter ta.

original: dz'a ta:/ dz'a ta b'a na /
analyzed: dz'a ta:/ dz'a ta b'a na /
translated: The letter sa is the sound of the letter ta.🔽The letter ja is the sound of the letter ta.🔽The letter ja is the sound of the letter jña.

original: 'joms par byas zin no //
analyzed: 'joms par byas zin no //
translated: Having destroyed.

original: rko bar byed zin no //🔽sbyin par byas zin no //
analyzed: rko bar byed zin no // sbyin par byas zin no //
translated: Having dug.🔽Having given.

original: sbyin par byed zin no zhes pa nishtha'o zhes pas kta dang kta banta'o //
analyzed: sbyin par byed zin no zhes pa nishtha'o zhes pas kta dang kta banta'o //
translated: Having given.

original: skye bar byas zin no zhes pa 'gro ba'i don dang las med pa zhes pas kta'o //🔽ding shvi ma yin pa zhes pas aita med do //
analyzed: skye bar byas zin no zhes pa 'gro ba'i don dang las med pa zhes pas kta'o // ding shvi ma yin pa zhes pas aita med do //
translated: Having caused to arise.🔽Not today.

original: 'dis aa nyid do //
analyzed: 'dis aa nyid do //
translated: By this, the very thing.

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: In the same way,

original: kh'a ti:/ s'a ti:/
analyzed: kh'a ti:/ s'a ti:/
translated: Khatam, satam,🔽jatam.

original: dz'a ti:/ bud med la kti'o //
analyzed: dz'a ti:/ bud med la kti'o //
translated: To a woman, khatam.

original: dhut la zhes pa ci zhen /
analyzed: dhut la zhes pa ci zhen /
translated: What is dhut?

original: kha ni tva /
analyzed: kha ni tva /
translated: The mouth is the end.

original: ti tsa'o // ya la yang na'o //
analyzed: ti tsa'o // ya la yang na'o //
translated: The end is the end.

original: lnga pa au pa dh'a can zhes pa 'di las yon tan med pa zhes pa 'jug go //
analyzed: lnga pa au pa dh'a can zhes pa 'di las yon tan med pa zhes pa 'jug go //
translated: The fifth is upapada.

original: kha ni sa ni dzan rnams kyi a'a nyid du yang na 'gyur te ;
analyzed: kha ni sa ni dzan rnams kyi a'a nyid du yang na 'gyur te ;
translated: The very thing of the khani, sani, jana is also the end.

original: ya yig dang po yon tan med pa pha rol la'o //
analyzed: ya yig dang po yon tan med pa pha rol la'o //
translated: The first ya is the other without quality.

original: pra kh'a ya /🔽pra p'a ya /
analyzed: pra kh'a ya / pra p'a ya /
translated: Prakhay.🔽Prapay.

original: pra dz'a ya /🔽pra ba n+ya /🔽pra sa n+ya /
analyzed: pra dz'a ya / pra ba n+ya / pra sa n+ya /
translated: Praja.🔽Pravanya.🔽Prasanya.

original: pra dza n+ya /
analyzed: pra dza n+ya /
translated: Prajana.

original: byed pa'o gcig can dag gi zhes pas ktva'o //
analyzed: byed pa'o gcig can dag gi zhes pas ktva'o //
translated: The one with the causative.

original: tshig sdud la 'byung ba la zhes pas yapa\'o //
analyzed: tshig sdud la 'byung ba la zhes pas yapa\'o //
translated: In the case of the formation of a compound, la is used.

original: yang na a'a nyid do //
analyzed: yang na a'a nyid do //
translated: Or a itself.

original: de bzhin du /🔽kh'a ya te /
analyzed: de bzhin du / kh'a ya te /
translated: Similarly, kha is used.🔽Khaṇḍita, broken.

original: kha n+ya te /
analyzed: kha n+ya te /
translated: Khaṇḍita, to be broken.

original: p'a ya te /🔽sa n+ya te /
analyzed: p'a ya te / sa n+ya te /
translated: Pāyita, to be drunk.

original: dza ya te /
analyzed: dza ya te /
translated: Saṇṭhita, to be placed.🔽 Jāyita, to be born.🔽 Jānyita, to be known.

original: dza n+ya te /
analyzed: dza n+ya te /
translated: Yāni, those.

original: @263b yana'o ; / yon tan med pa zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: @263b yana'o ; / yon tan med pa zhes pa ci zhe na /
translated: What is meant by without quality?

original: s'a n+yam / ri'i yi ge dang gsal byed mtha' las ghyana'o //
analyzed: s'a n+yam / ri'i yi ge dang gsal byed mtha' las ghyana'o //
translated: Saṇyami, to be placed on the mountain. The final consonant and vowel of the mountain are ghna.

original: ta no ti las yan la yang na 'dod de /🔽ta ya te /
analyzed: ta no ti las yan la yang na 'dod de / ta ya te /
translated: Or ya is desired from the root tan, to extend.🔽 Tāyita, to be extended.

original: ta n+ye ta /
analyzed: ta n+ye ta /
translated: Tānyita, to be extended.

original: sphu ri sphu li dag gi ghanya la aot kyi'o //
analyzed: sphu ri sphu li dag gi ghanya la aot kyi'o //
translated: Sphuri sphuli, to shine, have ghna with the o vowel.

original: yang na zhes pa ldog go //
analyzed: yang na zhes pa ldog go //
translated: Or and is used in the opposite sense.

original: sphur 'phro ba la'o //
analyzed: sphur 'phro ba la'o //
translated: Sphura means to shine.

original: sphu la g-yo ba la'o zhes pa sphu ri dang sphu li 'di dag gi ao yig gi a'a nyid du 'gyur te ghanya pha rol la'o //
analyzed: sphu la g-yo ba la'o zhes pa sphu ri dang sphu li 'di dag gi ao yig gi a'a nyid du 'gyur te ghanya pha rol la'o //
translated: Sphula means to move. These sphuri and sphuli have the a vowel of the o vowel of ghna.🔽 Viśphuraḥ, shining.

original: bi sph'a ra:/ bi sph'a la:/
analyzed: bi sph'a ra:/ bi sph'a la:/
translated: Viśphuli, shining.

original: sphu ri dang sbu li dag gi sngon ma dag go //
analyzed: sphu ri dang sbu li dag gi sngon ma dag go //
translated: They are the former of sphuri and sphuli.

original: dngos po la ghanya'o //
analyzed: dngos po la ghanya'o //
translated: In the case of a thing, ghna.

original: au pa dh'a'i yon tan can no //
analyzed: au pa dh'a'i yon tan can no //
translated: Upadhā, having qualities.

original: ao yig gi a'a nyid do //
analyzed: ao yig gi a'a nyid do //
translated: The a vowel of the o vowel.🔽

original: dza h'a ti'i ktva la aita'o //
analyzed: dza h'a ti'i ktva la aita'o //
translated: jahatī katva iṭaḥ.

original: dza h'a ti'i ao ha ka gtong ba la'o zhes pa 'di'i ai nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: dza h'a ti'i ao ha ka gtong ba la'o zhes pa 'di'i ai nyid du 'gyur te /

original: ktv'a'i rkyen pha rol la'o //
analyzed: ktv'a'i rkyen pha rol la'o //
translated: Katva is the case of the other.

original: hi tva:/ dza h'a ti'i zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: hi tva:/ dza h'a ti'i zhes pa ci zhe na /

original: h'a tva / ao h'ang /🔽tya ti sya ti m'a sth'a rnams kyi ta la yon tan med pa la'o //
analyzed: h'a tva / ao h'ang / tya ti sya ti m'a sth'a rnams kyi ta la yon tan med pa la'o //
translated: Hāṭvaḥ. Ohaṅ.

original: aita'i zhes pa kho na'o //
analyzed: aita'i zhes pa kho na'o //
translated: Tyasya ti mā sthāḥ. The ti of these is iṭaḥ.🔽Iṭaḥ.

original: do dum bur byed pa la'o //
analyzed: do dum bur byed pa la'o //
translated: Do dumbuḥ.

original: sho mtha'i las la'o //🔽m'a 'jal ba la'o //🔽m'ang 'jal ba la'o //
analyzed: sho mtha'i las la'o // m'a 'jal ba la'o // m'ang 'jal ba la'o //
translated: Śo mātṛkā.🔽Mā māna.🔽Māṅ māna.

original: men brdabs lan la'o //
analyzed: men brdabs lan la'o //
translated: Meṅ prahāṇa.

original: zhes pa yang na'o //
analyzed: zhes pa yang na'o //
translated: This is the second.🔽🔽

original: sth'a gnas pa la'o//
analyzed: sth'a gnas pa la'o//
translated: Sthā sthāna.

original: 'di rnams kyi ta yig dang po can gyi yon tan med pa pha rol la ai nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi ta yig dang po can gyi yon tan med pa pha rol la ai nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: The ti of these is iṭaḥ.

original: dya ti'idh'a min pa'i da'i dat'o zhes pas da ta ru bsgyur ba thob pa la'o //
analyzed: dya ti'idh'a min pa'i da'i dat'o zhes pas da ta ru bsgyur ba thob pa la'o //
translated: Dyāti dhamīna. The da of this is dattaḥ.

original: d'a m'a g'a ya ti pi bti sth'a sya ti zhes pas a'i nyid thob pa la'o //
analyzed: d'a m'a g'a ya ti pi bti sth'a sya ti zhes pas a'i nyid thob pa la'o //
translated: Dā mā gāyate pibati sthāsyati. The a of this is āt.🔽Ditvaḥ.

original: di ta:/ di ta b'an /
analyzed: di ta:/ di ta b'an /
translated: Ditvā.

original: si ta:/ si ta b'an /🔽mi ta:/ mi ta b'an\/
analyzed: si ta:/ si ta b'an / mi ta:/ mi ta b'an\/

analyzed: sthi ta:/ sthi ta b'an / dum bur byas zin no //

analyzed: dum bur byed zin no // mtha'i las byas zin no //

analyzed: mtah'i las byed zin no //

analyzed: 'jal ba byas zin no //

analyzed: 'jal ba byed zin no zhes pa la nishtha'o zhes pas kta dang kta bandu'o //
translated: mitaḥ, mitam vā🔽sthitaḥ, sthitam vā

original: mtha'i las byed zin no //
analyzed: mtha'i las byed zin no //

analyzed: gnas par byas zin to // gnas par byed zin to zhes pa 'gro ba'i don dang las med pa zhes pas kta'o //
translated: sthitaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: 'dis ai nyid do //
analyzed: 'dis ai nyid do //
translated: This is the i itself.

original: ta zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: ta zhes pa ci zhe na /
translated: What is the ta?

original: di ya te /
analyzed: di ya te /
translated: It is the di.

original: di m'a ga ya ti zhes pas a'i nyid do //
analyzed: di m'a ga ya ti zhes pas a'i nyid do //
translated: It is the ai.

original: yon tan med pa zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: yon tan med pa zhes pa ci zhe na /
translated: What is the absence of quality?

original: d'a t'a tsh'a sha dag gi yang na'o //
analyzed: d'a t'a tsh'a sha dag gi yang na'o //
translated: It is the na of the group of dā, ṭā, ṣa.

original: yon tan med pa zhes pa 'jug ste /
analyzed: yon tan med pa zhes pa 'jug ste /
translated: The absence of quality is applied.

original: ghanya aal dag la zhes pa 'di las sngon du'o //
analyzed: ghanya aal dag la zhes pa 'di las sngon du'o //
translated: Before ghya and ṅya.

original: tstsho gcod pa la'o //
analyzed: tstsho gcod pa la'o //
translated: Cch is for cutting.

original: sho phra mor byed pa la'o zhes pa de dag gi ta yig dang po can yon tan med pa pha rol la yang na ai nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sho phra mor byed pa la'o zhes pa de dag gi ta yig dang po can yon tan med pa pha rol la yang na ai nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: In the case of the word śo (he cut), the first syllable ta (he) becomes nī (his) when there is no quality and the other is a feminine.🔽Cchittaḥ, cchittavān.

original: tstshi ta:/ tstshi ta b'an /🔽tstsh'a ta b'a na /🔽shi ta: shi ta b'an /
analyzed: tstshi ta:/ tstshi ta b'an / tstsh'a ta b'a na / shi ta: shi ta b'an /
translated: Cchātavān.🔽 Śhitaḥ, śhitavān.

original: sh'a ta:/ sh'a ta b'an /🔽gcod par byas zin no //
analyzed: sh'a ta:/ sh'a ta b'an / gcod par byas zin no //
translated: Śhātavān.🔽 He has cut.🔽 He is cutting.

original: gcod par byed zin no //🔽phra mor byed zin no zhes pa'o //🔽sho phra mor byed pa la'o zhes pa 'di'i brtul @264a * //
analyzed: gcod par byed zin no // phra mor byed zin no zhes pa'o // sho phra mor byed pa la'o zhes pa 'di'i brtul @264a * //

original: zhugs kyi yul la rtag tu ai nyid du 'dod de /
analyzed: zhugs kyi yul la rtag tu ai nyid du 'dod de /
translated: In the case of the word śo (he cut), the first syllable ta (he) is always desired to be nī (his) in the object of the vow.

original: sam shi ta:/ bram ze'i brtul zhugs 'dzin no zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: sam shi ta:/ bram ze'i brtul zhugs 'dzin no zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Samśitaḥ, he holds the vow of a Brahmin.

original: da dha ti'i hi'o //
analyzed: da dha ti'i hi'o //
translated: Dadhatīha.

original: dudh'anya 'dzin pa la'o zhes pa 'di'i ta yig dang bo can yon tan med pa la hi ru bsgyur bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: dudh'anya 'dzin pa la'o zhes pa 'di'i ta yig dang bo can yon tan med pa la hi ru bsgyur bar 'gyur te /
translated: In the case of the word dhānya (grain), the first syllable da (he) becomes hi (his) when there is no quality.

original: yi ge gcig ma yin pa nyid las thams cad kyi'o //
analyzed: yi ge gcig ma yin pa nyid las thams cad kyi'o //
translated: This is because it is not a single syllable, but of all.🔽 Hitāḥ, hitavān.🔽 He has held.

original: hi t'a: hi ta b'an /
analyzed: hi t'a: hi ta b'an /
translated: He is holding.🔽 🔽 🔽 🔽 🔽

original: 'dzin par byas zin no //
analyzed: 'dzin par byas zin no //
translated: It is already apprehended.🔽

original: 'dzin par byed zin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'dzin par byed zin no zhes pa'o //
translated: It is said, It is already grasped.🔽🔽

original: da dh'a ti'i zhes nges par bstan pa ni dhe ta'i bzlog pa'i don du'o //🔽des na / dh'i ta:/
analyzed: da dh'a ti'i zhes nges par bstan pa ni dhe ta'i bzlog pa'i don du'o // des na / dh'i ta:/
translated: The syllable da is taught as da.🔽The syllable ca is taught as ca.🔽The syllable cha is taught as cha.🔽The syllable ja is taught as ja.

original: btung bar byas zin no zhes pa d'a m'a g'a ya ti zhes bas a'i nyid do //🔽tsar phal dag gi aa'i auta'o //🔽tsar 'gro ba'i don no //
analyzed: btung bar byas zin no zhes pa d'a m'a g'a ya ti zhes bas a'i nyid do // tsar phal dag gi aa'i auta'o // tsar 'gro ba'i don no //

original: phal rdzogs pa la'o//
analyzed: phal rdzogs pa la'o//

analyzed: nyi phal bral ba la'o zhes pa yang na'o // 'di dag gi aa'i au yig tu bsgyur bar 'gyur te ta yon tan med pa pha rol la'o //

original: ts'urti:/ pra phulti:/ bud med la kti'o //
analyzed: ts'urti:/ pra phulti:/ bud med la kti'o //

original: 'dis au nyid do //
analyzed: 'dis au nyid do //

analyzed: rdzogs par byed zin no //

analyzed: zhes pa ste 'gro ba'i don dang las med pa zhes pas kta'o // dha min pa'i d'a'i da ta'o //

analyzed: d'a'i ming can gyi dh'a min pa ste dhet bor ba ba de'i da ta ru bsgyur bar 'gur te /

analyzed: yon tan med pa pha rol la'o //

analyzed: da tta:/ da tta b'a na / da ttv'a / sbyin pa byas zin to //

analyzed: sbyin pa byed zin to zhes pa ste 'dis da ta'o // dva zhes pa ci zhe na / d'a tam kshe tam /

analyzed: gcod par byas zin no zhes pa'o // dh'a ma yin pa zhes pa ci zhe na /

original: dh'i ta:/ dh'i ta b'an /
analyzed: dh'i ta:/ dh'i ta b'an /
translated: The ta affix is added to the root.

original: dhet 'thung ba la'o //🔽btung ba byas zin no //
analyzed: dhet 'thung ba la'o // btung ba byas zin no //
translated: The ta affix is added to the root.🔽The ta affix is added to the root.

original: btung ba byed zin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: btung ba byed zin no zhes pa'o //
translated: The ta affix is added to the root.

original: dha ma yin pa zhes pa'i zhes pa'i dgag pa ni dheta la yin gyi du dh'anya ma yin te yin na de'i hi ru 'gyur ba las da dha ti'i hi'o zhes pa'i hi ru bsgyur ba yong pas so //
analyzed: dha ma yin pa zhes pa'i zhes pa'i dgag pa ni dheta la yin gyi du dh'anya ma yin te yin na de'i hi ru 'gyur ba las da dha ti'i hi'o zhes pa'i hi ru bsgyur ba yong pas so //
translated: The negative in adhamma is a negative of the demonstrative, not a negative of the indefinite. If it were the latter, it would be hi. But it is changed to hi of datthi.

original: nyer bsgyur dbyangs las ta'o //
analyzed: nyer bsgyur dbyangs las ta'o //
translated: The final vowel of the prefix is ta.

original: d'a'i zhes pa kho na ste dh'a ma yin pa zhes pa'ang ngo //
analyzed: d'a'i zhes pa kho na ste dh'a ma yin pa zhes pa'ang ngo //
translated: It is only da. Adhamma is also that.

original: nyer bsgyur dbyangs mtha' can las pha rol d'a'i ming can dheta bor ba de'i ta yig du bsgyur bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: nyer bsgyur dbyangs mtha' can las pha rol d'a'i ming can dheta bor ba de'i ta yig du bsgyur bar 'gyur te /
translated: The final vowel of the prefix is changed to ta of the other, which is the name of da. The ta of that is changed to du.

original: ta yon tan med pa pha rol la'o //
analyzed: ta yon tan med pa pha rol la'o //
translated: It is the other without the quality of ta.

original: snga mas da ta ru bsgyur ba 'thob pa la'o //
analyzed: snga mas da ta ru bsgyur ba 'thob pa la'o //
translated: The previous one is changed to da. It is obtained.

original: brattam / tsandra par /
analyzed: brattam / tsandra par /
translated: Bhattam, candrapam.

original: pra la sogs pa'i aa tsa ta'o zhes pas aa tsa'i te'o //
analyzed: pra la sogs pa'i aa tsa ta'o zhes pas aa tsa'i te'o //
translated: By pra and so on, it is acati.

original: khar la dzha la'i tsar'o zhes pas da'i ta'o //
analyzed: khar la dzha la'i tsar'o zhes pas da'i ta'o //
translated: By khare jhalici, it is dat.

original: aa tsa @264b ma yin pa la'o zhes pas ta phyi gnyis su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: aa tsa @264b ma yin pa la'o zhes pas ta phyi gnyis su 'gyur ro //
translated: By not acati, the two ta are changed to pha.

original: de ltar na rkyen gyi ta yig dang bcas pas ta yig bzhir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na rkyen gyi ta yig dang bcas pas ta yig bzhir 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, with the ta of the condition, the ta becomes four.

original: hal las dzhar la dzhar rnams kyi mthun pa'i gnas su dbyi ba yang na'o zhes pa ta yig dbus ma dag dbyi'o //
analyzed: hal las dzhar la dzhar rnams kyi mthun pa'i gnas su dbyi ba yang na'o zhes pa ta yig dbus ma dag dbyi'o //
translated: In the place of the similar ones of hal, la, ja, jha, da, dha, ta, tha, da, dha, ba, bha, ya, ra, la, va, and sa, i is also.

original: aa battam / phul du byung bas sbyin pa byas zin no //
analyzed: aa battam / phul du byung bas sbyin pa byas zin no //
translated: Avadatta. Having given a gift with excellence.

original: nges par sbyin pa byas zin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: nges par sbyin pa byas zin no zhes pa'o //
translated: Having given a gift with certainty.

original: 'dis ta yig tu bsgyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'dis ta yig tu bsgyur ba'o //
translated: This changes ta to da.

original: ci'i phyir 'dir ta yig gnyis su bsgyur bar mi 'gyur zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'dir ta yig gnyis su bsgyur bar mi 'gyur zhe na ma yin te /
translated: Why is it not changed to two tas here? It is not.

original: ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: nyer bsgyur las d'a'i ming can gyi pha rol la bya ba ni dang bo dang lhan cig pa'o zhes pa'i tshig las dang po dang bcas pa bsgyur bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyer bsgyur las d'a'i ming can gyi pha rol la bya ba ni dang bo dang lhan cig pa'o zhes pa'i tshig las dang po dang bcas pa bsgyur bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the action of the one having the name da from the preposition is with the first, from the words “together with the first,” it is changed to have the first.

original: dbyangs las zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: dbyangs las zhes pa ci zhe na /
translated: What is meant by “from a vowel”?

original: ni ra dattam /
analyzed: ni ra dattam /
translated: Niradatta.

original: snga mas da tata'o //
analyzed: snga mas da tata'o //
translated: The previous one is datta.

original: nyer bsgyur las zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: nyer bsgyur las zhes pa ci zhe na /
translated: What is meant by “from a preposition”?

original: shri datta:/ dpal gyi sbyin par bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: shri datta:/ dpal gyi sbyin par bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: Śrīdatta. The gift of glory.

original: dh'a min pa'i zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: dh'a min pa'i zhes pa ci zhe na /
translated: What is meant by “not dha”?

original: pra dh'i ta:/ dheta 'thung ba la'o //
analyzed: pra dh'i ta:/ dheta 'thung ba la'o //
translated: Pradhīta. Dheti means to drink.

original: aa nu dattam dang / su dattam dang pra dattam ni dang po'i las la ste /
analyzed: aa nu dattam dang / su dattam dang pra dattam ni dang po'i las la ste /
translated: anudattaṃ, sudattaṃ, pradattaṃ are the first-person endings.

original: bi dattam dang aa ba dattam dang ni dattam zhes pa mi 'dod do //
analyzed: bi dattam dang aa ba dattam dang ni dattam zhes pa mi 'dod do //
translated: vidattaṃ, avadattaṃ, nidattaṃ are not desired.

original: ta yig tu bsgyur bar mi 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: ta yig tu bsgyur bar mi 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The letter ta is not changed.

original: pra dattam zhes pa 'di ni dang po'i las kho na la 'gyur te /
analyzed: pra dattam zhes pa 'di ni dang po'i las kho na la 'gyur te /
translated: This pradattaṃ is only for the first person.

original: sbyin pa'i ched du rab tu 'jug pa ni /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i ched du rab tu 'jug pa ni /

original: pra dattam'o // don gzhan la ni prattam zhes pa kho nar 'dod de //
analyzed: pra dattam'o // don gzhan la ni prattam zhes pa kho nar 'dod de //

original: gang zag gzhan rnams aa nu dattam la sogs pa rnams la rnams bar brtag pas ta yig tu bsgyur bar sbobs par byed do //
analyzed: gang zag gzhan rnams aa nu dattam la sogs pa rnams la rnams bar brtag pas ta yig tu bsgyur bar sbobs par byed do //

original: yab la'ang aa da'i dza ghi'o//
analyzed: yab la'ang aa da'i dza ghi'o//

original: aa di'i dza ghir bsgyur bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: aa di'i dza ghir bsgyur bar 'gyur te /

original: ta yon tan med pa pha rol dang yap\ la'o //
analyzed: ta yon tan med pa pha rol dang yap\ la'o //
translated: Ta is for the sake of another, and ya is for the father.

original: ai yig ni brjod pa'i don to //
analyzed: ai yig ni brjod pa'i don to //

original: dza gha:/ dza gha b'an /
analyzed: dza gha:/ dza gha b'an /

original: aad za ba la'o //
analyzed: aad za ba la'o //

original: bza' ba byas zin no //
analyzed: bza' ba byas zin no //

analyzed: bza' ba byed zin no zhes pa ste dza ghi ram bsgyur ba'o // gha dha dha bha rnams las so zhes pas dha'o //

original: dhuta rnams kyi gsum pa'o zhes pas dh'a yig gi da yig go //
analyzed: dhuta rnams kyi gsum pa'o zhes pas dh'a yig gi da yig go //

analyzed: de bzhin du / dzagha / ktva'o // pra dzaghya / kta'i ya ba'o //

analyzed: ghanya aa la dag la ghasli'o // ghanya aa la dag pha rol la aa di'i gha sar bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: la yig ni 'di'i don no // aa tsa la'ang 'dod de /

original: pra gha sa:/ rab tu bza' bar byed do zhes pa 'di'i pa tsa la sogs pa rnama las zhes pas aatsa'o //
analyzed: pra gha sa:/ rab tu bza' bar byed do zhes pa 'di'i pa tsa la sogs pa rnama las zhes pas aatsa'o //
translated: The word having is the past participle of the root gha, to go, in the sense of the future.

original: kta dang kta bantu dag ni nishtha'o //
analyzed: kta dang kta bantu dag ni nishtha'o //
translated: Kta and ktvān are niṣṭhā.

original: kta dang kta bantu zhes pa 'di dag nishtha'i ming can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: kta dang kta bantu zhes pa 'di dag nishtha'i ming can du 'gyur ro //

original: @265a * // nishtha'i ming gang du dgos she na /
analyzed: @265a * // nishtha'i ming gang du dgos she na /

original: ra las nishtha'i ta'i na te zhes pa la sogs pa rnams su'o //🔽k'irnna:/ k'irnn'a b'an /
analyzed: ra las nishtha'i ta'i na te zhes pa la sogs pa rnams su'o // k'irnna:/ k'irnn'a b'an /

original: shirnna:/ shirnna b'an /
analyzed: shirnna:/ shirnna b'an /

original: kr'i rnam par bskyed pa la'o //
analyzed: kr'i rnam par bskyed pa la'o //

original: shri 'tshe ba la'o //🔽bskyod par byas zin no //
analyzed: shri 'tshe ba la'o // bskyod par byas zin no //

original: skyod par byed zin no //🔽'tshe ba byas zin no //
analyzed: skyod par byed zin no // 'tshe ba byas zin no //
translated: Afflicting has been done.🔽Afflicting has been done.

original: 'tshe ba byed zin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'tshe ba byed zin no zhes pa'o //

original: nishtha'o zhes pas kta dang kta bantu'o //
analyzed: nishtha'o zhes pas kta dang kta bantu'o //
translated: Niṣṭhā: kta and ktvān.

original: shri au'i yi ge zhes pas aata dgag pa'o //
analyzed: shri au'i yi ge zhes pas aata dgag pa'o //
translated: Śrī: the letter u.

original: r'ita mtha'i aira'o //
analyzed: r'ita mtha'i aira'o //
translated: Rita: the final ai.

original: n'a mi'i ra ba dag ces pas ring pa'o //
analyzed: n'a mi'i ra ba dag ces pas ring pa'o //

original: ra las nishtha'i zhes pas na nyid do //
analyzed: ra las nishtha'i zhes pas na nyid do //
translated: Rālleniṣṭhā: the na.

original: kt'a dang ma dang mtshams sbyor gyi yi ge'i mtha'i mi zad pa'o //
analyzed: kt'a dang ma dang mtshams sbyor gyi yi ge'i mtha'i mi zad pa'o //
translated: Kta, ma, and the final letter of the conjuncts are not elided.

original: zlas dbye khong na yod pa'i 'bru mang po pa'o ;
analyzed: zlas dbye khong na yod pa'i 'bru mang po pa'o ;
translated: many grains that are inside the husk.

original: / ktv'a'i mtha' dang ma mtha' dang mtshams sbyor gyi yi ge'i mtha' can gyi sgra mi zad pa'i ming can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: / ktv'a'i mtha' dang ma mtha' dang mtshams sbyor gyi yi ge'i mtha' can gyi sgra mi zad pa'i ming can du 'gyur ro //
translated: The sound that has the end of ktvā, the end of the indeclinable, and the end of the connecting letter is called the name of the inexhaustible.

original: ktv'a'i mtha'i ni kri tv'a /
analyzed: ktv'a'i mtha'i ni kri tv'a /
translated: The end of ktvā is kṛtvā.

original: ma mtha' ni /
analyzed: ma mtha' ni /
translated: The indeclinable is

original: sva dum k'a ram /
analyzed: sva dum k'a ram /
translated: svaduṃkāram.

original: ro myang ba byas nas zhes pa'o //
analyzed: ro myang ba byas nas zhes pa'o //
translated: Having savored, it is said.

original: ro myang ba la'o zhes pas kha munya'o //
analyzed: ro myang ba la'o zhes pas kha munya'o //
translated: In savoring, it is khamūnyaḥ.

original: kha yig ni ring po dang nye ba'i tshig ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: kha yig ni ring po dang nye ba'i tshig ces pa'i don to //
translated: The letter kha is the meaning of long and short words.

original: au yig ni brjod pa'i don ;
analyzed: au yig ni brjod pa'i don ;
translated: The letter u is the meaning of expression.

original: aa'i au ba dh'a zhes pas 'phel ba'o //
analyzed: aa'i au ba dh'a zhes pas 'phel ba'o //
translated: The letter ā is the meaning of increase.

original: thung ngu dang aa ru sha dag gi zhes pas ma a'a ga ma'o //
analyzed: thung ngu dang aa ru sha dag gi zhes pas ma a'a ga ma'o //
translated: The short and the letter a are the meaning of ruśa.

original: mtshams sbyor gyi yi ge'i mtha' ni //
analyzed: mtshams sbyor gyi yi ge'i mtha' ni //
translated: The end of the connecting letter is

original: karta bee / ta bee /
analyzed: karta bee / ta bee /
translated: kartva, tavva.

original: ke ke n+ya tv'a zhes pas ta bee'i rkyen no //
analyzed: ke ke n+ya tv'a zhes pas ta bee'i rkyen no //
translated: The condition of tavva is keke nyatvā.

original: mi zad pa'i ming can yin pa na mi zad pa las kyang ngo zhes pas rnam dbye 'jig go //
analyzed: mi zad pa'i ming can yin pa na mi zad pa las kyang ngo zhes pas rnam dbye 'jig go //
translated: When it is the name of the inexhaustible, it is also from the inexhaustible.

original: jo bo drag 'byor gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa slob ma la phan pa'i krita'i rab tu byed ba rkang pa dang po rdzogs so /
analyzed: jo bo drag 'byor gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa slob ma la phan pa'i krita'i rab tu byed ba rkang pa dang po rdzogs so /
translated: The commentary composed by the great master Drak-bor, the Kritay-prakriya which benefits the students, is complete.

original: // / dpang lo ts'a ba dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas bsgyur ba'o //
analyzed: // / dpang lo ts'a ba dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas bsgyur ba'o //
translated: It was translated by the pandit and the translator Pal-den-lo-dro-ten-bay.

original: 'dis kyang bstan pa dang sems can la phan par gyur cig //
analyzed: 'dis kyang bstan pa dang sems can la phan par gyur cig //
translated: May it benefit the doctrine and sentient beings.

original: /* // gsung gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: /* // gsung gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Lord of Speech.

original: byings las so// 'di ni spyir btang ba ste /
analyzed: byings las so// 'di ni spyir btang ba ste /
translated: From the root. This is a general statement.

original: gang 'og nas rim pas 'byung ba'i rkyen de rnams byings las pha rol du 'gyur ro zhes rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gang 'og nas rim pas 'byung ba'i rkyen de rnams byings las pha rol du 'gyur ro zhes rig par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that the conditions which will be presented below in order are beyond the root.

original: yu bu dzha rnams kyi aana aa ka aanta zhes pa 'di las gong du sbyir btang ba'o //
analyzed: yu bu dzha rnams kyi aana aa ka aanta zhes pa 'di las gong du sbyir btang ba'o //
translated: The an-an-kan-ta of the u-bu-dza-has is beyond this general statement.

original: bdun pa brjod pa nye ba'i tshig go //
analyzed: bdun pa brjod pa nye ba'i tshig go //
translated: The seventh case is the proximate expression.

original: bdun pa brjod pa ni bdun pa brjod pa'o //
analyzed: bdun pa brjod pa ni bdun pa brjod pa'o //
translated: The seventh case is the seventh case.

original: 'dir spyir btang ba'i byings gang la bdun pa brjod pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir spyir btang ba'i byings gang la bdun pa brjod pa ste /
translated: Here, the general statement is the root of the seventh case.

original: bdun pa'i mtha' can brjod pa de nyid ba'i tshig gi ming can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdun pa'i mtha' can brjod pa de nyid ba'i tshig gi ming can du 'gyur ro //
translated: The one ending in the seventh case is called a word with the case-ending of the dative.

original: las la aana'o //
analyzed: las la aana'o //
translated: The suffix an is for action.

original: 'dir las la zhes pa nye ba'i tshig go //
analyzed: 'dir las la zhes pa nye ba'i tshig go //
translated: Here, the suffix an is a proximate word.

original: kum bha ka ra:/
analyzed: kum bha ka ra:/
translated: kumbhakāraḥ

original: bum pa byed do zhes pas aana'o //
analyzed: bum pa byed do zhes pas aana'o //
translated: makes a pot.

original: aa'i au pa dh'a zhes pas 'phel ba'o //
analyzed: aa'i au pa dh'a zhes pas 'phel ba'o //
translated: The suffix an is for increase.

original: bum pa yod pa'i sgra nye ba'i tshig gi ming can @265b de ;
analyzed: bum pa yod pa'i sgra nye ba'i tshig gi ming can @265b de ;
translated: The word for the existence of a pot is a proximate word.🔽That is a compound.

original: de'i de'i bsdu pa'o zhes pas k'a ra'i sgra dang bcas pas tshig bsdu ba ste /
analyzed: de'i de'i bsdu pa'o zhes pas k'a ra'i sgra dang bcas pas tshig bsdu ba ste /
translated: The word kāra is included.

original: der gnas rnam dbye rnams dbyi bar bya'o zhes pas aa ma dbyi'o //
analyzed: der gnas rnam dbye rnams dbyi bar bya'o zhes pas aa ma dbyi'o //
translated: The case-endings are elided.🔽The name of the root is the final of the compound.

original: lji ba'i ming gi byed pa ni byings kyi gnyis tshig gi mtha' thob pa de ltar yang tri ti dang n'a tha du'o //
analyzed: lji ba'i ming gi byed pa ni byings kyi gnyis tshig gi mtha' thob pa de ltar yang tri ti dang n'a tha du'o //
translated: Thus, the third case and the seventh case are elided.

original: des na 'dir mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: des na 'dir mi 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, it does not occur here.

original: phyogs gcig la /
analyzed: phyogs gcig la /
translated: In one part,

original: kumbham ka ro ti /
analyzed: kumbham ka ro ti /
translated: kumbham karoti.

original: gal te 'gyur na aana'i rkyen 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te 'gyur na aana'i rkyen 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were to occur, the condition of the suffix an would occur.

original: nye ba'i tshig rkyen gyi mtha' can gang yin pas nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: nye ba'i tshig rkyen gyi mtha' can gang yin pas nus pa ma yin te /
translated: That which has the condition of a proximate word at the end is not possible.

original: byings dang bral ba de'i 'di ming don med pa mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: byings dang bral ba de'i 'di ming don med pa mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The meaning of the root is not lost when it is separated from the affix.

original: tri ti n'a tha dag la har ti las phyugs la'o zhes pa 'dir gal te yang bdun pa'i gnyis tshig gi mtha' thob pa de ltar yang tri ti dang n'a tha dag la nye ba'i tshig gi ming can te /
analyzed: tri ti n'a tha dag la har ti las phyugs la'o zhes pa 'dir gal te yang bdun pa'i gnyis tshig gi mtha' thob pa de ltar yang tri ti dang n'a tha dag la nye ba'i tshig gi ming can te /
translated: In the expression “cattle of the three and seven,” even though the dual ending is obtained, the words “three” and “seven” are called “approximates.”

original: phyugs kyi sgra ni bdun pa'i mtha'i don brjod pa'o //
analyzed: phyugs kyi sgra ni bdun pa'i mtha'i don brjod pa'o //
translated: The word “cattle” expresses the meaning of the seventh case.

original: de gzhin du gzhan la nye ba'i tshig dang 'brel ba la kyang 'di don dang 'brel pa nang gi yan lag go zhes pa de las thob par bya'o //
analyzed: de gzhin du gzhan la nye ba'i tshig dang 'brel ba la kyang 'di don dang 'brel pa nang gi yan lag go zhes pa de las thob par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, in other cases where there is a connection with an approximate, the meaning of the connection should be understood to be an internal part of the word.

original: nye ba'i tshig gi ming gang du dgos she na /
analyzed: nye ba'i tshig gi ming gang du dgos she na /
translated: Where is the name of the approximate required?

original: ring po nye ba'i tshig ces pa 'dir ro //🔽gal te ming yin na de snga mar ro //
analyzed: ring po nye ba'i tshig ces pa 'dir ro // gal te ming yin na de snga mar ro //
translated: In the expression “long approximate.”🔽If it is a name, it is before.

original: gal te nye ba'i tshig de ming yin na ste gal te rtags yin par gyur na de'i tshe byings las snga ma kho nar sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: gal te nye ba'i tshig de ming yin na ste gal te rtags yin par gyur na de'i tshe byings las snga ma kho nar sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: If that approximate is a name, if it is a suffix, then it should be connected to the root only before.

original: kumbha k'a ra:/ kashtha d'a ha:/
analyzed: kumbha k'a ra:/ kashtha d'a ha:/
translated: Kumbhakāraḥ, kṣatadāhaḥ.

original: las la aa na'o //
analyzed: las la aa na'o //
translated: In the case of action, the affix is ana.

original: ming zhes pa ci zhe na /🔽bhoktu mitstsha ti /
analyzed: ming zhes pa ci zhe na / bhoktu mitstsha ti /
translated: What is a nominal stem?🔽Bhoktumicchati.

original: aitstsha ti bhoktum /
analyzed: aitstsha ti bhoktum /
translated: Icchati bhoktuṃ.

original: 'dod pa'i don rnams la byed pa po gcig pa can zhes pas tuma'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i don rnams la byed pa po gcig pa can zhes pas tuma'o //
translated: The meaning is: “He desires to be the agent with regard to the object of desire.”

original: de'i des bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: de'i des bsdu ba'o //
translated: The affix is added to that.

original: ming nye ba'i tshig de'i de'i ste krita'i rkyen gyi mtha' can de dang bcas pas bsdu par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ming nye ba'i tshig de'i de'i ste krita'i rkyen gyi mtha' can de dang bcas pas bsdu par 'gyur ro //
translated: The nominal stem is that, with the affix of the kṛt class. It is collected with that.

original: go da:/ kampa la da:/🔽ba lang sbyin par byed do //
analyzed: go da:/ kampa la da:/ ba lang sbyin par byed do //
translated: Godah, kampaladah.🔽He gives a cow.

original: kampa la sbyin par byed do zhes so //🔽a'at\ las nye bsgyur ba'i da'o //
analyzed: kampa la sbyin par byed do zhes so // a'at\ las nye bsgyur ba'i da'o //
translated: He gives a garland.🔽The affix is da.

original: bsdu ba la aam dbyi'o //
analyzed: bsdu ba la aam dbyi'o //
translated: In the case of collection, the affix is am.

original: aam min pa'i mi zad pas ma yin no //
analyzed: aam min pa'i mi zad pas ma yin no //
translated: The affix is not am, because it is not an affix of the class of am.

original: ming nye ba'i tshig de'i mi zad pa'i krit kyi mtha' dang lhan cig pa de'i thog ma'i dngos po'i tshig sdud du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: ming nye ba'i tshig de'i mi zad pa'i krit kyi mtha' dang lhan cig pa de'i thog ma'i dngos po'i tshig sdud du mi 'gyur te /
translated: The nominal stem is that, with the affix of the kṛt class. It is not collected with the initial of that.

original: aam\ ma yin pa ste aam gyi mtha' can gyi mi zad pas ni 'gyur ro //
analyzed: aam\ ma yin pa ste aam gyi mtha' can gyi mi zad pas ni 'gyur ro //
translated: The affix is not am, because it is an affix of the class of am.

original: k'a lo bhoktum /
analyzed: k'a lo bhoktum /
translated: Kālo bhoktuṃ.

original: bho ktum / k'a la:/
analyzed: bho ktum / k'a la:/
translated: bhoktuṃ, kālaḥ,

original: k'a la sa ma ya be l'a /
analyzed: k'a la sa ma ya be l'a /
translated: kālasamayavelāyām,

original: nus pa'i don rnams la zhes pas tuma\'o //
analyzed: nus pa'i don rnams la zhes pas tuma\'o //
translated: nuṣṭhāneṣu, iti tum.

original: aama\ min pa zhes pa ci zhe na /🔽ka n+y'a d'arsham bar ya ti /
analyzed: aama\ min pa zhes pa ci zhe na / ka n+y'a d'arsham bar ya ti /
translated: aṃ, na iti kim?🔽kaṇyādarśane vartate.

original: dri shir blta ba la'o //
analyzed: dri shir blta ba la'o //
translated: darśaḥ paśyane,

original: mtha' dag la dri sha las nam\'o zhes pa nama'o //
analyzed: mtha' dag la dri sha las nam\'o zhes pa nama'o //
translated: sarvatra darśaḥ, nam.

original: yon tan no //
analyzed: yon tan no //
translated: guṇe.

original: gsum pa la sogs pa rnams kyi yang na'o //
analyzed: gsum pa la sogs pa rnams kyi yang na'o //
translated: tṛtīyādiṣv api naḥ.

original: mi zad pa zhes pa kho na'o //
analyzed: mi zad pa zhes pa kho na'o //
translated: akṣaraṃ eva.🔽aṃ, na iti nivṛttiḥ.🔽tṛtīye upadamanśile iti.

original: aama\ min pa zhes pa ldog / gsum pa la au ba dam shi la'o zhes pa 'dinas brtsams pa'i nye ba'i tshig byed pa po la kr'i ta rnams so @266a * //
analyzed: aama\ min pa zhes pa ldog / gsum pa la au ba dam shi la'o zhes pa 'dinas brtsams pa'i nye ba'i tshig byed pa po la kr'i ta rnams so @266a * //
translated: ataḥ prabhṛti upasargaṃ kartṛkārakam.

original: zhes pa 'di las gang du 'chad par 'gyur ba de rnams ni gsum pa rnams brjod pa'o //

analyzed: byed do zhes wuntri tsa dag go zhes pas wuna tri tsa dag go //

original: bud med ma yin pa la gzugs mtshungs pa ma yin pa yang na'o //
analyzed: bud med ma yin pa la gzugs mtshungs pa ma yin pa yang na'o //

analyzed: gzugs mtshungs pa min pa ni gzugs mtshungs pa ma yin pa ste spyir btang bas gzugs ma tshungs pa ma yin pa'o //

analyzed: spyir btang ba'i tha dad pa'i gzugs la dmigs kyis bsal bas yang na gnod par 'gyur te /

original: spyir btang ba'i yul gyi phyogs la yang dmigs kyis bsal ba 'jug go zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: spyir btang ba'i yul gyi phyogs la yang dmigs kyis bsal ba 'jug go zhes pa'i don to //

original: bud med ma yin pa ste bud med la kti'o zhes pa'i skabs 'dir sbyir btang ba dmigs bsal gyis rtag tu gnod te /
analyzed: bud med ma yin pa ste bud med la kti'o zhes pa'i skabs 'dir sbyir btang ba dmigs bsal gyis rtag tu gnod te /
translated: It is not a woman. In this context, kat is a general rule, but it is always harmed by a specific rule.

original: wun tri tsa dag go zhes pa sbyir btang ba la /
analyzed: wun tri tsa dag go zhes pa sbyir btang ba la /
translated: The general rule is “vuntri tsa.”🔽The specific rule is “namu upadha prikri jña.”

original: n'a m'i au pa dh'a dang pri kri kri dznya rnams kyi ka'o zhes pa'i dmigs kyis bsal pas wun tri tsa dang bcas pa de dag la yang na gnod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: n'a m'i au pa dh'a dang pri kri kri dznya rnams kyi ka'o zhes pa'i dmigs kyis bsal pas wun tri tsa dang bcas pa de dag la yang na gnod par 'gyur te /
translated: The specific rule harms the general rule, even though it is accompanied by “vuntri tsa.”

original: ba ksha sa:/ biksha sa ka:/
analyzed: ba ksha sa:/ biksha sa ka:/
translated: The specific rule is “baksha sa, bikhashasa ka, bikheshas ta.”

original: bikshe st'a / rnam par bskyed do zhes pa la n'a mi au pa dh'a zhes pas ka'o //
analyzed: bikshe st'a / rnam par bskyed do zhes pa la n'a mi au pa dh'a zhes pas ka'o //
translated: The specific rule is “namu upadha.”

original: wuna tri tsa dag go zhes pa 'dis lbuna tri tsa dag go //
analyzed: wuna tri tsa dag go zhes pa 'dis lbuna tri tsa dag go //
translated: The general rule is “vuntri tsa.”

original: gzugs mtshungs pa ma yin pa zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: gzugs mtshungs pa ma yin pa zhes pa ci zhe na /

original: las la aana zhes @266b pa 'di spyir btang nas /🔽nyer bsgyur med pa'i a'ata las da'o zhes pa'i dmigs bsal des spyir btang de la rtag tu gnod de /

original: gzugs pa mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs pa mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The specific rule always harms the general rule because of the similarity of form.

original: go da:/ nyer bsgyur med pa'i a'ata las nga'o //
analyzed: go da:/ nyer bsgyur med pa'i a'ata las nga'o //
translated: The indeclinable a is from the root at, “to be.”

original: 'on da dang aa na dag gzugs tha dad pas mtshungs pa dag tu ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'on da dang aa na dag gzugs tha dad pas mtshungs pa dag tu ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: But since the forms of ida and ana are different, how can they be similar?

original: 'di ni yang dag min te /
analyzed: 'di ni yang dag min te /

original: rjes su 'brel pa byas pa ma yin pa la gzugs mtshungs pa min ba'i tshig las rjes su 'brel pa can dang / ming rjes su 'brel pa gzugs tha dad par bya bar ci ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: rjes su 'brel pa byas pa ma yin pa la gzugs mtshungs pa min ba'i tshig las rjes su 'brel pa can dang / ming rjes su 'brel pa gzugs tha dad par bya bar ci ltar 'gyur /
translated: Since the word “similar” is not related to the non-past, how can the related and the name that is related be made different in form?

original: bud med min pa la zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: bud med min pa la zhes pa ci zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning of “not a woman”?

original: bud med la kti'o zhes pa sbyir btang ba de la 'dod pa'i rkyen las aa'o zhes pa'i dmigs bsal gyis kti zhes pa 'di la rtag tu gnod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: bud med la kti'o zhes pa sbyir btang ba de la 'dod pa'i rkyen las aa'o zhes pa'i dmigs bsal gyis kti zhes pa 'di la rtag tu gnod par 'gyur te /
translated: The general rule is “kati for a woman.” The particular rule “a for desire” supersedes this, so kati is always harmed by this.

original: tsi k'arshi byed par 'dod pas zhes pas 'dod pa'i rkyen las aa'o zhes pas ka ro ti las san mtha' las aa yig gi rkyen no //
analyzed: tsi k'arshi byed par 'dod pas zhes pas 'dod pa'i rkyen las aa'o zhes pas ka ro ti las san mtha' las aa yig gi rkyen no //
translated: Since the desire is to make karṣa, the particular rule “a for desire” is the condition for the a of karṣa, and the condition for the a of san is the final of kati.

original: aa'i 'ang dbyi'o //
analyzed: aa'i 'ang dbyi'o //
translated: The a of ana is also the a of ati.

original: bud med la aa las a'a pa'o //🔽ta bya aa n'a ya dag go //
analyzed: bud med la aa las a'a pa'o //🔽ta bya aa n'a ya dag go //
translated: For a woman, a becomes ā from a.🔽The ta of kati becomes a from the a of ana.

original: byings las ta bya aa n'i ya dag rkyen du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byings las ta bya aa n'i ya dag rkyen du 'gyur ro //
translated: The root [letters] ta and ya become the conditions of the [preceding] a and na.

original: a'a si ta bham /
analyzed: a'a si ta bham /
translated: a-si-ta-bham

original: a'a sa n'i yam /
analyzed: a'a sa n'i yam /

original: karta byam / kar n'i yam /
analyzed: karta byam / kar n'i yam /

original: las dang byed pa po'i don la bhi di las /
analyzed: las dang byed pa po'i don la bhi di las /

original: ke li ma'i rkyen bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: ke li ma'i rkyen bshad par bya'o //

original: bhi de li m'a m'a sha /
analyzed: bhi de li m'a m'a sha /

analyzed: rang nyid thod ces bhi di las ke li ma'i rkyen no //

original: ka yig ni ka la yan bzhin zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: ka yig ni ka la yan bzhin zhes pa'i don to //

original: ba si las byed pa po'i don la ta bya bshad par byas te gnas so zhes /
analyzed: ba si las byed pa po'i don la ta bya bshad par byas te gnas so zhes /
translated: The root [letter] ba is explained as the meaning of agent, and the condition ta is to do, so it is said, to remain.

original: b'asta bya:/ dbyangs las ya'o //
analyzed: b'asta bya:/ dbyangs las ya'o //

original: dbyangs mtha'i byings las ya'i rkyen 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbyangs mtha'i byings las ya'i rkyen 'gyur ro //

original: bha byam / la byam /
analyzed: bha byam / la byam /

original: skal ba dang ldan par bya'o //
analyzed: skal ba dang ldan par bya'o //

original: gcad par bya'o zhes pas ya'i rkyen no //
analyzed: gcad par bya'o zhes pas ya'i rkyen no //

original: yon tan / aot\ aoota dag las krita'i ya dbyangs bzhin no zhes pas dbyangs bzhin du 'gyur ba'i phyir aa wa'o //
analyzed: yon tan / aot\ aoota dag las krita'i ya dbyangs bzhin no zhes pas dbyangs bzhin du 'gyur ba'i phyir aa wa'o //
translated: The condition of the krit [group] is like the vowel from the [letters] yo and o, so it is said, like the vowel, so it becomes a.

original: 'on gsal byed mtha' las ghyana zhes 'chad par 'gyur ba'i shugs las dbyangs mtha' las ya'i rkyen nyid 'gyur ro zhes pas dbyangs mos pa don med do zhe na /
analyzed: 'on gsal byed mtha' las ghyana zhes 'chad par 'gyur ba'i shugs las dbyangs mtha' las ya'i rkyen nyid 'gyur ro zhes pas dbyangs mos pa don med do zhe na /
translated: But the final letter of the vowel is elided by the force of the statement that the final consonant is ghya, and the condition of ya is obtained from the final vowel. Therefore, the vowel i is meaningless.

original: bden te 'on kyang go sla ba'i don du'o //🔽sha ki sa hi pa sde mtha' las kyang ngo //
analyzed: bden te 'on kyang go sla ba'i don du'o // sha ki sa hi pa sde mtha' las kyang ngo //
translated: True, but it is for the sake of ease of understanding.🔽The final class of the roots sak and sah is also so.

original: sha ki dang sa hi'i byings las dang pa sde'i mtha' can las kyang ya'i rkyen du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sha ki dang sa hi'i byings las dang pa sde'i mtha' can las kyang ya'i rkyen du 'gyur ro //
translated: The condition of ya is obtained from the roots sak and sah, and from the final of the class of dan.

original: ri'i yi ge dang gsal byed mtha' las ghyana thob pa la'o //
analyzed: ri'i yi ge dang gsal byed mtha' las ghyana thob pa la'o //

original: gamyam / lambhyam /

analyzed: sha sha 'tshe ba la'o // ya ti 'bad pa la'o //

analyzed: tsa ti slong ba la'o//

analyzed: @267a * // a'at khan dag gi a'ita 'ang ngo //

analyzed: a'a yig mtha'i byings dang khan las kyang ya'i rkyen 'gyur zhing mtha'i 'ang a'i yig tu bsgyur ba 'ang ngo //

analyzed: a'a yig mtha' las ya'i rkyen grub pa la brjod pa ni a'i nyid kyi don te /

analyzed: de yam / be yam / khe yam ; dud'anya sbyin pa la'o //

translated: kha,🔽nu,

original: ya'i rkyen no /
analyzed: ya'i rkyen no /

original: mtha' a'i nyid do //
analyzed: mtha' a'i nyid do //

analyzed: yon tan / kha na'i aa'i yi ge ai'i yig ge la ae'o //
translated: The quality is kha, the letter a of ā is the letter i of ai.

analyzed: 'o na de'i 'ang yon tan du ci'i phyir mi 'gyur zhe na /

original: brjod par bya sten nang gi yan lag nyid las ae nyid 'jug pa phyi rol gyi yan lag la mi 'gyur ba'i phyir yon tan ma yin no //
analyzed: brjod par bya sten nang gi yan lag nyid las ae nyid 'jug pa phyi rol gyi yan lag la mi 'gyur ba'i phyir yon tan ma yin no //

analyzed: gal te phyir rol gyi yan lag ji ltar yin zhe na /

analyzed: a'a tsrya:/ bla ma ma yin pa zhes pa ci zhe na /

analyzed: a'a ts'arya:/ ghyana'o //

analyzed: panya aa badya badya rnams btsang bya smad bya 'gog pa min pa rnams la'o //

analyzed: gal te badya'i sgra bud med kyi rtags nye bar gyur pa zhes pas 'di'i ci las yin zhe na /

original: rnam par bshad pa las so //🔽bahyam byed pa la'o //
analyzed: rnam par bshad pa las so // bahyam byed pa la'o //
translated: It is explained in the grammar.🔽Bhag is for the meaning of ‘doing.’

original: byed pa'i don la bahyam gyi sgra tshig phrad do //
analyzed: byed pa'i don la bahyam gyi sgra tshig phrad do //
translated: The term bhag is a prefix for the meaning of ‘doing.’

original: ba hyam sha ka tam /
analyzed: ba hyam sha ka tam /
translated: Bhag shaktam.🔽This is for ‘doing’ and also for ‘basis.’

original: 'dis 'dre'o zhes byed pa dang gzhi dag la'ang zhes pas auta'i rkyen thob pa las ya'i rkyen byas pa tshig phrad do //
analyzed: 'dis 'dre'o zhes byed pa dang gzhi dag la'ang zhes pas auta'i rkyen thob pa las ya'i rkyen byas pa tshig phrad do //
translated: The suffix ya is obtained from the root uṭ, ‘to arise,’ and the suffix ya is a prefix.

original: byed pa la zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: byed pa la zhes pa ci zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning of ‘doing’?

original: bahyam / ghyana'o ;
analyzed: bahyam / ghyana'o ;
translated: Bhag ghyan.

original: / aarya jo bo rje rigs dag la'o //
analyzed: / aarya jo bo rje rigs dag la'o //
translated: Arya is for ‘lord’ and ‘noble.’

original: aarya'i sgra jo bo dang rje rigs dag gi don la tshig phrad do //🔽aarya:/ jo bo'o //
analyzed: aarya'i sgra jo bo dang rje rigs dag gi don la tshig phrad do // aarya:/ jo bo'o //
translated: The term ārya is a prefix for the meaning of ‘lord’ and ‘noble.’🔽Ārya is ‘lord.’

original: aarya rje rigs /
analyzed: aarya rje rigs /
translated: Ārya is ‘noble.’🔽Ghyan is for ‘going.’

original: ri 'gro ba la'o zhes pa 'di las ghyana thob pa la ya'i rkyen byas pa tshig phrad do //
analyzed: ri 'gro ba la'o zhes pa 'di las ghyana thob pa la ya'i rkyen byas pa tshig phrad do //
translated: This is obtained from the root ri, ‘to go,’ and the suffix ya is a prefix.

original: jo bo rje rigs dag la zhes ba ci zhe na /
analyzed: jo bo rje rigs dag la zhes ba ci zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning of ‘lord’ and ‘noble’?

original: aarya:/ au pa sarga bskyed pa'i dus ldan ma la'o//
analyzed: aarya:/ au pa sarga bskyed pa'i dus ldan ma la'o//
translated: Ārya is for ‘upasargā,’ ‘the time of generation.’

original: bskyed pa'i zhes pa gnyis tshig go //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i zhes pa gnyis tshig go //
translated: The two words “having generated” are a compound.

original: aupa sa rga'i sgra gal te bskyed pa ste mngal bzung ba gang bskyed pa'i dus la bab pa mngon par brjod par gyur pa na de tshig phrad do //
analyzed: aupa sa rga'i sgra gal te bskyed pa ste mngal bzung ba gang bskyed pa'i dus la bab pa mngon par brjod par gyur pa na de tshig phrad do //
translated: The word upajāti is “having generated,” that is, having taken up the womb. When the time of generation has arrived, it is expressed. Then it is a compound.

original: au pa sarya goo:/
analyzed: au pa sarya goo:/
translated: Upaśarīra.

original: sri 'gro ba la'o zhes pa 'di las au pa sngon ma can la ghyana thob pa la ya'i rkyen byas pa tshig phrad do //
analyzed: sri 'gro ba la'o zhes pa 'di las au pa sngon ma can la ghyana thob pa la ya'i rkyen byas pa tshig phrad do //
translated: It is a living being. In this, the upa of the former has the prefix ghya, and the suffix ya is a compound.

original: bskyed pa zhes pa ci zhe na /🔽aupa s'arya sha ra di b'ar na s'i /
analyzed: bskyed pa zhes pa ci zhe na / aupa s'arya sha ra di b'ar na s'i /
translated: What is “generation”?🔽Upaśarīra means “to go.”

original: 'gro bar bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'gro bar bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: It means “to go.”

original: aa dzarya yang dag par songa ba la'ong ngo //🔽aadzarya'i sgra gal te yang dag par song ba ste /
analyzed: aa dzarya yang dag par songa ba la'ong ngo // aadzarya'i sgra gal te yang dag par song ba ste /
translated: Ajar means “having gone well.”🔽The word ajar is “having gone well.”

original: yang dag par song ba po'i byings don yang dag par songs ba por byed pa por gyur pa na tshig phrad do //
analyzed: yang dag par song ba po'i byings don yang dag par songs ba por byed pa por gyur pa na tshig phrad do //
translated: When the root of “having gone well” is made into a noun, “having gone well,” it is a compound.

original: aadzayaryamnostu / yang dag par song ba'o //
analyzed: aadzayaryamnostu / yang dag par song ba'o //
translated: Ajaram asti. It is having gone well.

original: dzr'isha lang tsho nyams pa la'o //
analyzed: dzr'isha lang tsho nyams pa la'o //
translated: Jari means “having lost youth.”

original: nanya sngon du'o //
analyzed: nanya sngon du'o //
translated: Nya is in front.

original: lang tsho nyams par mi byed do zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: lang tsho nyams par mi byed do zhes pa'i don to //
translated: It does not diminish youth.

original: buna sogs rnams thob pa la ya'i rkyen byas pa ni tshig phrad do //
analyzed: buna sogs rnams thob pa la ya'i rkyen byas pa ni tshig phrad do //
translated: The meaning of the words is: the condition of the ya is made by the un aspirated and so forth.

original: yang dag par song ba la zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: yang dag par song ba la zhes pa ci zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning of “in the case of correct going”?

original: aadza ti t'a kam ba la:/
analyzed: aadza ti t'a kam ba la:/
translated: Ajjatitakam balam.

original: tritsa dang aita'o //
analyzed: tritsa dang aita'o //
translated: Tric and it.

original: ming la bad las kyapa'o //
analyzed: ming la bad las kyapa'o //
translated: In the case of a name, kyap.

original: nyer bsgyur med pa la zhes pa 'dir @268a * //
analyzed: nyer bsgyur med pa la zhes pa 'dir @268a * //
translated: The word “without a prefix” is used here.

original: 'jug ste / mdo phyi ma la'ang ngo //
analyzed: 'jug ste / mdo phyi ma la'ang ngo //
translated: It is also in the case of a suffix.

original: ming nye ba'i tsheg la nyer bsgyur med pa'i ba di las ya'i rkyen 'gyur zhing kyap\'o //
analyzed: ming nye ba'i tsheg la nyer bsgyur med pa'i ba di las ya'i rkyen 'gyur zhing kyap\'o //
translated: When a name is near, the condition of the ya changes from the un aspirated badi to kyap.

original: sa tya ba tyam /
analyzed: sa tya ba tyam /
translated: Satya-vatyam.

original: bden par brjod do //
analyzed: bden par brjod do //
translated: It is said to be true.

original: sa tyo tya /
analyzed: sa tyo tya /
translated: Satyo-tya.

original: bad gsal ba'am bden par smra'o zhes pas ya'i rkyen dang kyap\'o //
analyzed: bad gsal ba'am bden par smra'o zhes pas ya'i rkyen dang kyap\'o //
translated: It is said to be clear or true.

original: kyap\ pha rol la sogs pa'i brtsi zhes pas sam pra p'a s'a ra na'o //
analyzed: kyap\ pha rol la sogs pa'i brtsi zhes pas sam pra p'a s'a ra na'o //
translated: Kyap is the calculation of the other side and so forth, or prapasaranam.

original: ming la zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: ming la zhes pa ci zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning of “in the case of a name”?

original: badyam / ghyana'o //
analyzed: badyam / ghyana'o //
translated: Bdyam. Ghyanam.

original: nyer bsgyur med pa'i zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: nyer bsgyur med pa'i zhes pa ci zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning of “without a prefix”?

original: pra p'adyam / mrish'a sngon ma can gyi ba de las kyap yang na 'dod de /🔽mrish'a ba di ta byam /
analyzed: pra p'adyam / mrish'a sngon ma can gyi ba de las kyap yang na 'dod de / mrish'a ba di ta byam /
translated: pra + √dyam = pra + √dyam🔽mṛṣā + √vad = mṛṣā + √vad

original: mrisho dyam / kyap\'i pa rjes su 'brel pa byed pa ni brinya dri dzushi zhes pa 'di'i don no //
analyzed: mrisho dyam / kyap\'i pa rjes su 'brel pa byed pa ni brinya dri dzushi zhes pa 'di'i don no //
translated: The affix kvip is added to the root, and the affix kvip is added to the root.

original: de la ni mdo las slar yang kyap\ smos pa ni gang 'chad par 'gyur ba de dang de'i kyap\ las pa rjes su 'brel par gyur pa la nye ba'i tshig bya ba'o //
analyzed: de la ni mdo las slar yang kyap\ smos pa ni gang 'chad par 'gyur ba de dang de'i kyap\ las pa rjes su 'brel par gyur pa la nye ba'i tshig bya ba'o //
translated: In that case, the sūtra's mention of kvip again is a term of proximity for what is to be explained, the affix kvip being added to that and that root.

original: bhu las dngos po la'o //
analyzed: bhu las dngos po la'o //
translated: bhu for a thing.

original: ming nye ba'i tshig la nyer bsgyur med par gyur pa na bhu las dngos pa'i don la kyap\ 'gur ro //🔽bra h'a bhu yam ga ta:/
analyzed: ming nye ba'i tshig la nyer bsgyur med par gyur pa na bhu las dngos pa'i don la kyap\ 'gur ro // bra h'a bhu yam ga ta:/
translated: When the name is in proximity and does not have a prefix, kvip is added to the meaning of a thing from bhu.

original: de ba bhu yam ga ta:/
analyzed: de ba bhu yam ga ta:/
translated: brahma + bhu + yam gat = brahma + bhu + yam gat🔽deva + bhu + yam gat = deva + bhu + yam gat

original: tshangs pa'i dngos po /
analyzed: tshangs pa'i dngos po /
translated: the state of Brahmā

original: lha'i dngos po zhes kyap\'o //
analyzed: lha'i dngos po zhes kyap\'o //
translated: the state of a god

original: 'o na dngos po dang las dag la kritya kta zhes pa'i tshig las dngos po dang las kyi don dag la kyapra mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'o na dngos po dang las dag la kritya kta zhes pa'i tshig las dngos po dang las kyi don dag la kyapra mi 'gyur te /
translated: Well then, from the word kṛtya-kṛt for thing and action, kvip would not be added to the meanings of thing and action.

original: der las med pa nyid las bhu las dang po kho na las kyap\ 'gyur zhes pas dngos po smos pas ci bya /
analyzed: der las med pa nyid las bhu las dang po kho na las kyap\ 'gyur zhes pas dngos po smos pas ci bya /
translated: What is the use of mentioning the thing?

original: bden mod bhu thob pa la'o aarnga ma ne'i tshig go zhes pa 'di'i yang 'dir bzung bar bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: bden mod bhu thob pa la'o aarnga ma ne'i tshig go zhes pa 'di'i yang 'dir bzung bar bshad par bya ste /
translated: It is true, but it should be explained that this is also taken here as “bhu for obtaining, ar for non-arising.”

original: 'di'i las la yang thob bo //
analyzed: 'di'i las la yang thob bo //
translated: This also has the meaning of “obtaining” in the sense of “arising.”

original: las la 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i dngos po nyid ji ltar 'gyur ba de ltar dngos po smos pas bh'u thob pa la'o zhes pa 'di tsur sogs nyid las ain mtha' can ji ltar yin /
analyzed: las la 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i dngos po nyid ji ltar 'gyur ba de ltar dngos po smos pas bh'u thob pa la'o zhes pa 'di tsur sogs nyid las ain mtha' can ji ltar yin /
translated: Just as the thing is mentioned in order to show that the thing itself does not arise from the action, how is it that this “bhu for obtaining” is like “ain” which has the suffix “in” added to it?

original: de'i phyir 'dir dngos po smos pa srid do zhes pa ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir dngos po smos pa srid do zhes pa ji ltar zhe na /
translated: Therefore, how is it that the thing is mentioned here as possible?

original: 'di ni snying po med pa ste pra prisha las yang na'o zhes pa'i tshig las rnams par brtag par 'di las ain 'dod do //
analyzed: 'di ni snying po med pa ste pra prisha las yang na'o zhes pa'i tshig las rnams par brtag par 'di las ain 'dod do //
translated: This is pointless. From “pra” and “pri” the word “again” is formed. The analysis of the words is desired from this “ain.”

original: hana'i ta'o // dngos po la zhes pa kho na'o //
analyzed: hana'i ta'o // dngos po la zhes pa kho na'o //
translated: “Hani” is the same as “bhāva.”🔽“Bhāva” is the same as “bhāva.”

original: ming nye ba'i tshig la nyer bsgyur med par gyur pa na hanti las dngos po'i don la kyap\ 'gyur zhing ha na'i 'ang ta yig tu bskyur bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ming nye ba'i tshig la nyer bsgyur med par gyur pa na hanti las dngos po'i don la kyap\ 'gyur zhing ha na'i 'ang ta yig tu bskyur bar 'gyur ro //
translated: meaning of thing, and the H is also elided.

original: shva ha ty'a ;
analyzed: shva ha ty'a ;
translated: Śva-hatyā

original: brisha la haty'a /
analyzed: brisha la haty'a /
translated: Briśa-hatyā

original: khyi mo 'jos so //
analyzed: khyi mo 'jos so //
translated: A bitch is killed.

original: dmangs rigs 'joms so zhes pas kyap\'o //
analyzed: dmangs rigs 'joms so zhes pas kyap\'o //

original: na'i ta'o // rang bzhin las 'di bud med la 'jug go //
analyzed: na'i ta'o // rang bzhin las 'di bud med la 'jug go //
translated: The feminine is from the natural base.

original: ming la zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: ming la zhes pa ci zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning of “in the name”?🔽Ghat

original: ghata:/ dngos po la ghanya'o //
analyzed: ghata:/ dngos po la ghanya'o //
translated: In a thing, there is Gnya.

original: hanti'i ta'o // hanti'i ha'i ghi'o //
analyzed: hanti'i ta'o // hanti'i ha'i ghi'o //
translated: From HANTI, there is T. From HANTI, there is Hī and GHI.

original: nyer bsgyur med pa zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: nyer bsgyur med pa zhes pa ci zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning of “without a prefix”?🔽Upāghāta

original: au pa gh'ata:/ 'o na @268b kyap\ yod par ma gyur pa na ghyan dper brjod par rigs so zhe na /
analyzed: au pa gh'ata:/ 'o na @268b kyap\ yod par ma gyur pa na ghyan dper brjod par rigs so zhe na /
translated: If there is no prefix, then it is proper to give an example of Ghya.

original: 'di yod mod 'on kyang hanti las ghyana ma mthong ste /
analyzed: 'di yod mod 'on kyang hanti las ghyana ma mthong ste /
translated: This is indeed so, but Ghya is not seen from HANTI,

original: mngon par brjod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon par brjod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not in the grammar.

original: dngos po la zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: dngos po la zhes pa ci zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning of “in a thing”?

original: shva gh'a tyo mrig khyi rnams kyi gsad par bya zhes ri yig dang gsal byed mtha' las zhes pas las la ghyanya'o //
analyzed: shva gh'a tyo mrig khyi rnams kyi gsad par bya zhes ri yig dang gsal byed mtha' las zhes pas las la ghyanya'o //
translated: The gha of ghāta and the kṣa of kṣip are the last of the gutturals and cerebrals, and so ghāta and kṣip are the objects of the action.

original: brinya dridzu shi aina sh'a su stu gu ha rnams kyi kyap\'o //🔽bri zhes pas brinya bzung bar bshad par bya'o bri ma yin no //
analyzed: brinya dridzu shi aina sh'a su stu gu ha rnams kyi kyap\'o // bri zhes pas brinya bzung bar bshad par bya'o bri ma yin no //
translated: The root śvaghātya means “to kill dogs.”🔽The root bṛñ means “to take.”

original: brinya 'dam pa la'o //🔽dring ma gus pa la'o //🔽dzush'i dga' ba dang bstan pa la'o //
analyzed: brinya 'dam pa la'o // dring ma gus pa la'o // dzush'i dga' ba dang bstan pa la'o //

original: 'di rnams las kyis 'gyur ro //

original: britya:/ aadri tya:/ dzushya:/

analyzed: sh'asa'i au pa dh'a'i aana zhes pas ai nyid do //

analyzed: aa yar bsgyur ro //

analyzed: aagni tsi tya:/ me bsag par bya'o zhes pas de nyid tshig phrad do //

analyzed: aa m'a b'a sya yang na'o //

analyzed: yang na smos pas bsi'i au pa dh'a ring po rnam par brtag par bya'o zhes gsungs ngo //

analyzed: aa m'a pa sya /

original: yang na / aa m'a b'a sy'a /
analyzed: yang na / aa m'a b'a sy'a /

analyzed: aa m'a'i sgra sngon du'o //

analyzed: aa m'a'i sgra ni lhan cig pa'i don to //

analyzed: des na gang nyi ma dang zla ba lhan cig gnas pa de ni /

analyzed: aa m'a b'a sy'a /

original: kyap\'o // tshig phrad do //
analyzed: kyap\'o // tshig phrad do //

analyzed: ring po yang na dang sam pra s'a ra na med pa tshig phrad do //

original: dngos po'i don la 'di tshig phrad do //
analyzed: dngos po'i don la 'di tshig phrad do //

original: ta bee ke ke n+ya tv'a rnams so //🔽byings las ta bee dang ke dang ke n+ya dang tva zhes pa'i rkyen 'di rnams 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ta bee ke ke n+ya tv'a rnams so // byings las ta bee dang ke dang ke n+ya dang tva zhes pa'i rkyen 'di rnams 'gyur ro //

original: ta bee la /
analyzed: ta bee la /

original: pa ri dh'a ta bee ;
analyzed: pa ri dh'a ta bee ;
translated: Pari is the condition of dhā.

original: ke la / aa ba g'a he /
analyzed: ke la / aa ba g'a he /

original: g'a hu rnam par bsrung ba la'o //
analyzed: g'a hu rnam par bsrung ba la'o //

original: ke n+ya la /
analyzed: ke n+ya la /
translated: The condition of kenya is

original: shu sru she nya:/
analyzed: shu sru she nya:/
translated: śruśe.

original: shu sru 'gro ba la'o //
analyzed: shu sru 'gro ba la'o //

original: san mtha' las ke n+ya'i rkyen no //
analyzed: san mtha' las ke n+ya'i rkyen no //
translated: The condition of kenya is at the end of a saṃdhi.

original: aa yig 'ang dbyi'o //
analyzed: aa yig 'ang dbyi'o //

original: tv'a lam kartva da krinya byed pa la'o //
analyzed: tv'a lam kartva da krinya byed pa la'o //

original: sdeb sbyor gyi yul kho na la rkyen 'di rnams so zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: sdeb sbyor gyi yul kho na la rkyen 'di rnams so zhes gsungs so //
translated: These are the conditions only in the field of prosody.

original: de rnams kritya rnams so //
analyzed: de rnams kritya rnams so //

original: de rnams kyi sgras ta bya dang aan'i ya dang kya pra dang ghyana dang ta bee dang ke dang ken+ya dang tva zhes pa 'di rnams gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi sgras ta bya dang aan'i ya dang kya pra dang ghyana dang ta bee dang ke dang ken+ya dang tva zhes pa 'di rnams gzung bar bya ste /

original: ta bya la sogs pa de rnams kritya'i ming can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ta bya la sogs pa de rnams kritya'i ming can du 'gyur ro //
