original: kritya ming gang du dgos she na /
analyzed: kritya ming gang du dgos she na /

original: dngos po dang las dag la kritya zhes pa 'dir ro //
analyzed: dngos po dang las dag la kritya zhes pa 'dir ro //

original: kartam byam / ka ra n'i yam /
analyzed: kartam byam / ka ra n'i yam /

analyzed: ta bya la sogs pa rnams kritya nyid kyi phyir dngos po dang las kyi don la 'gyur ro //

original: wuna tri tsa dag go //
analyzed: wuna tri tsa dag go //

original: byings las wuna tritsa zhes pa'i rkyen 'di dag 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byings las wuna tritsa zhes pa'i rkyen 'di dag 'gyur ro //

original: du krinya dang dup tsasha'i byings la buna rkyen byin byed do zhes pa la /
analyzed: du krinya dang dup tsasha'i byings la buna rkyen byin byed do zhes pa la /

original: k'a ra ka:/ kart'a /🔽'tshed par byed do ces pa /
analyzed: k'a ra ka:/ kart'a / 'tshed par byed do ces pa /

original: pa tsa ka:/ pakta /
analyzed: pa tsa ka:/ pakta /

analyzed: yu bu dzdha zhes pas bu'i aa ka ru bsgyur ro //

original: tsa yig la rjes su 'bral pa med pa bzung nas rjes su 'brel pa can gyis ma yin no zhes pa'i tshig las ri'i rkyen kho na gzungs bar 'gyur gyis drina'i ni ma yin no //

original: auta sngon du'o //
analyzed: auta sngon du'o //
translated: Uts means before.

original: len par byed do shin tu bzod par byed do shin tu gsal bar byed do zhes la ni ni'o //
analyzed: len par byed do shin tu bzod par byed do shin tu gsal bar byed do zhes la ni ni'o //
translated: Grahaṇa means to grasp, utsāhana means to endure, udbhāsan means to shine.

original: ai yig brjod pa'i don to /
analyzed: ai yig brjod pa'i don to /
translated: The letter i has the meaning of expression.

original: na yig ni aitsa dang 'dra ba'i don to //
analyzed: na yig ni aitsa dang 'dra ba'i don to //
translated: The letter na has the meaning similar to iṭ.

original: gra ha dang autsh'a ha dang / audbh'a sa dang / mantra dang / samba ra dang / ni raksha dang / sam bha bhya bha ra dang / aa dhya h'ara dang / aa y'a tsa dang / aa tra dza zhes pa la sogs pa graha sogs rnams te /
analyzed: gra ha dang autsh'a ha dang / audbh'a sa dang / mantra dang / samba ra dang / ni raksha dang / sam bha bhya bha ra dang / aa dhya h'ara dang / aa y'a tsa dang / aa tra dza zhes pa la sogs pa graha sogs rnams te /
translated: Graha, utsāha, udbhasa, mantra, sambhara, rakṣa, sambhavyabhāra, adhyahara, ayācata, atraja, etc. are the roots beginning with graha.

original: dbyangs kyi mtha' la tsitta dang 'dra ba ma yin pa'i byed pa po las zhes pas gra ha la sogs pa'i nang gi mdo bklag par bya'o //
analyzed: dbyangs kyi mtha' la tsitta dang 'dra ba ma yin pa'i byed pa po las zhes pas gra ha la sogs pa'i nang gi mdo bklag par bya'o //
translated: The final vowel is like citra, and the affix is -tṛ. The internal sandhi should be read as graha- etc.

original: 'di'i don dbyangs mtha'i byings las tsitta dad 'dra ba ma yin byed pa po nyid kyi phyir gang tsatta dang 'dra ba'i byed pa por mi 'gyur ba de las ni ni 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di'i don dbyangs mtha'i byings las tsitta dad 'dra ba ma yin byed pa po nyid kyi phyir gang tsatta dang 'dra ba'i byed pa por mi 'gyur ba de las ni ni 'gyur ro //
translated: The meaning of this is: Because the root ending in a vowel is like citra, and the affix is -tṛ, it is not the case that it becomes like citra. From that, it becomes ni.

original: aa k'a r'i gharma sya b'a l'a ta pa /
analyzed: aa k'a r'i gharma sya b'a l'a ta pa /
translated: Akārī gharmasya vālāṭapaḥ.

original: mi byed do zhes la ni ni'o //
analyzed: mi byed do zhes la ni ni'o //
translated: Not doing, in the locative.

original: 'dir b'a l'a tapa ;
analyzed: 'dir b'a l'a tapa ;
translated: Here, vālāṭa is the locative.

original: byed pa po de tsatta dang 'dra ba ma yin pa 'ong //
analyzed: byed pa po de tsatta dang 'dra ba ma yin pa 'ong //
translated: That agent is not like citra.

original: n'a mi au pa dh'a dang / pr'i kr'am gr'i dzny'a rnams kyi ka'o //
analyzed: n'a mi au pa dh'a dang / pr'i kr'am gr'i dzny'a rnams kyi ka'o //
translated: The case endings of nāma, upadhā, and prī, and the case endings of jñā.

original: gang gi au pa dh'a n'a ma yin pa de ni n'a mi au pa dh'a'o //
analyzed: gang gi au pa dh'a n'a ma yin pa de ni n'a mi au pa dh'a'o //
translated: That which is not an upadhā of nāma is nāma-anupadhā.

original: de nas zlas dbye ba'o //
analyzed: de nas zlas dbye ba'o //
translated: Then, the dvandva compound.

original: n'a mi au pa dh'a can gyi byings dang prinya tshim pa la'o phrid dga' ba la'o zhes pa yang na'o //
analyzed: n'a mi au pa dh'a can gyi byings dang prinya tshim pa la'o phrid dga' ba la'o zhes pa yang na'o //
translated: The root having nāma-anupadhā, and prī is for satisfaction, and pri is for delight.

original: kr'i rnam par bskyod pa la'o //
analyzed: kr'i rnam par bskyod pa la'o //
translated: In the sense of shaking, from the root kri.

original: gr'i gsal bar byed pa la'o //
analyzed: gr'i gsal bar byed pa la'o //
translated: In the sense of illuminating, from the root gri.🔽In the sense of understanding, from the root jña.

original: dzny'a khong du chud pa la'o zhes pa 'di rnams las kyang ka'i rkyen 'gyur te /🔽bi kshi pa /🔽bi li kha /
analyzed: dzny'a khong du chud pa la'o zhes pa 'di rnams las kyang ka'i rkyen 'gyur te / bi kshi pa / bi li kha /
translated: From these, the affix ka is added.

original: kshi pa 'dor ba la'o //
analyzed: kshi pa 'dor ba la'o //
translated: In the sense of scattering, from the root kṣip.

original: li kha 'dri ba dang yi ge 'god pa la'o //
analyzed: li kha 'dri ba dang yi ge 'god pa la'o //
translated: In the sense of asking and writing, from the root likh.

original: rnam par 'dor bar byed do //
analyzed: rnam par 'dor bar byed do //
translated: It is scattered.🔽It is asked.

original: 'dri bar byed do zhes pa la ka'o //🔽phri n'a ti /
analyzed: 'dri bar byed do zhes pa la ka'o // phri n'a ti /
translated: In the sense of taking away, from the root hr.

original: 'am / pri ya te /
analyzed: 'am / pri ya te /
translated: Or in the sense of being dear, from the root pri.

original: zhes pa / pri ya:/
analyzed: zhes pa / pri ya:/
translated: In the sense of being dear, from the root pri.

original: zhes pa yang na ste @272b aiya auwa dag dbyangs dang po la'o zhes pas ai ya'o //🔽skyod par byed do la /🔽ka ri:/ gsal bar byed do la /
analyzed: zhes pa yang na ste @272b aiya auwa dag dbyangs dang po la'o zhes pas ai ya'o // skyod par byed do la / ka ri:/ gsal bar byed do la /
translated: Or, from the root pri, the affix iya is added, and the first vowel is elided, giving i.🔽In the sense of shaking, from the root kri.

original: gari:/ khong du chud par byed do la /🔽dznya:/ mu la pi bhudzala sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo /
analyzed: gari:/ khong du chud par byed do la / dznya:/ mu la pi bhudzala sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo /
translated: In the sense of illuminating, from the root gri.🔽In the sense of understanding, from the root jña.🔽From the roots mula, bhuja, and so on, the affix ka is also added.🔽From the roots mula, bhuja, and so on, the affix ka is added.

original: m'u la bi bhudza la sogs pa rnams las ka'i rkyen du 'gyur ro //🔽m'u la bi bhudza:/🔽k'a ka gu ha:/
analyzed: m'u la bi bhudza la sogs pa rnams las ka'i rkyen du 'gyur ro // m'u la bi bhudza:/ k'a ka gu ha:/
translated: In the sense of having roots, from the root mula.🔽In the sense of having arms, from the root bhuja.🔽In the sense of a crooked arm, from the root bhuja.

original: ku mu dam /
analyzed: ku mu dam /
translated: In the sense of a lotus, from the root kumuda.

original: bhu dzo 'khyog po la'o //
analyzed: bhu dzo 'khyog po la'o //
translated: In the sense of a crooked arm, from the root bhuja.

original: gu hu sgrib pa la'o //
analyzed: gu hu sgrib pa la'o //
translated: guhu, to concealment.

original: mu da dga' ba la'o //
analyzed: mu da dga' ba la'o //
translated: muda, to delight.

original: rtsa ba rnams 'khyog por byed do //
analyzed: rtsa ba rnams 'khyog por byed do //
translated: mūla, to crookedness.

original: bya rog rnams las sbed par byed do //
analyzed: bya rog rnams las sbed par byed do //
translated: kāka, to hiding from crows.

original: ku mu da dga' bar byed do zhes la ka'i rkyen no //
analyzed: ku mu da dga' bar byed do zhes la ka'i rkyen no //
translated: kumuda, to delight. The lakāra affix is added.

original: gu hi la las la ka'i rkyen bshad do //
analyzed: gu hi la las la ka'i rkyen bshad do //
translated: guhi, to action. The lakāra affix is explained.

original: mu la bi bhu dza sogs byings kyi tshogs so //
analyzed: mu la bi bhu dza sogs byings kyi tshogs so //
translated: mula, vibhuja, etc. are collections of roots.

original: des na bud med 'chad pa la tyakha:/
analyzed: des na bud med 'chad pa la tyakha:/
translated: Therefore, in the explanation of women, tyak.

original: tsakshinga'i khy'a nya ru bsgyur ba byas pa na ka'i rkyen no //
analyzed: tsakshinga'i khy'a nya ru bsgyur ba byas pa na ka'i rkyen no //
translated: cakṣiṅkhyā, when the change to ru is made, the lakāra affix is added.

original: nyer bsgyur la ni a'ata las da'o //
analyzed: nyer bsgyur la ni a'ata las da'o //
translated: For a prefix, the da affix is from āt.

original: nyer bsgyur nye ba'i tshig la aata las te aa yig gi mtha' can gyi byings las da'i rkyen 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyer bsgyur nye ba'i tshig la aata las te aa yig gi mtha' can gyi byings las da'i rkyen 'gyur ro //
translated: For a prefix, the near word, the da affix is from āt, the affix with the final letter a.

original: su gla:/ sumla:/ glee dga' ba zad pa la'o //
analyzed: su gla:/ sumla:/ glee dga' ba zad pa la'o //
translated: su, gla, suṃla, gle, to the exhaustion of delight.

original: mlee lus kyi rnam 'gyur la'o //
analyzed: mlee lus kyi rnam 'gyur la'o //
translated: mla, to the transformation of the body.

original: mdzes pa zad do //
analyzed: mdzes pa zad do //
translated: Beauty is exhausted.

original: mdzes pa'i lus rnam 'gyur ro zhes la da'o //
analyzed: mdzes pa'i lus rnam 'gyur ro zhes la da'o //
translated: The transformation of the beautiful body. Thus, the da affix.

original: rkyen gzhan byed pa ni hva ya ti la sam pra s'a ra na med pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: rkyen gzhan byed pa ni hva ya ti la sam pra s'a ra na med pa'i don du'o //
translated: The other condition is made by hāvyāyati, for the meaning of non-existence.

original: a'ahva:/ svahva:/ gal te 'dir ka'i rkyen gyur pa la sogs pa'i ba tsi zhes pas sam pra s'a ra na la au wa ru bsgyur ba byas na /
analyzed: a'ahva:/ svahva:/ gal te 'dir ka'i rkyen gyur pa la sogs pa'i ba tsi zhes pas sam pra s'a ra na la au wa ru bsgyur ba byas na /
translated: If the word bāca is formed by the addition of the affix ṇic to the root bāca, or if the word praśārana is formed by the addition of the affix uvar to the root praśā,

original: a'a hu ba:/ pra hu ba:/
analyzed: a'a hu ba:/ pra hu ba:/
translated: then āhuva, prahuva,

original: zhes gzhan par mi 'gyur ro //🔽dheta dri shi b'a ghr'a dhm'a las sha'o //
analyzed: zhes gzhan par mi 'gyur ro // dheta dri shi b'a ghr'a dhm'a las sha'o //
translated: will not be changed to something else.🔽The affix śa is added to the root dṛś by the addition of the affix dhatpratyaya.

original: nyer bsgyur nye ba'i tshig la dheta dang dri shi dang / p'a dang gha dang dhm'a zhes pa 'di rnams las shanga'i rkyen du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyer bsgyur nye ba'i tshig la dheta dang dri shi dang / p'a dang gha dang dhm'a zhes pa 'di rnams las shanga'i rkyen du 'gyur ro //
translated: The affixes de, dri, pa, ga, and dha are added to the root dṛś to form the near-synonyms.🔽uddhāya, utpaśya, utpipā,

original: auddha ya:/ autpashya:/ autpi ba:/🔽au dzdzi ghra:/ au ddha ma /
analyzed: auddha ya:/ autpashya:/ autpi ba:/ au dzdzi ghra:/ au ddha ma /
translated: udgṛhṇa, uddama.

original: shin tu 'thung bar byed do zhes sogs kyi dag byas pa la shanga'o //🔽aan pi ka ra na'o //🔽aa dang mtshams sbyor gyi yi ge dbyi'o //
analyzed: shin tu 'thung bar byed do zhes sogs kyi dag byas pa la shanga'o // aan pi ka ra na'o // aa dang mtshams sbyor gyi yi ge dbyi'o //
translated: The affix śa is added to the root pip by the addition of the affix dhatpratyaya.🔽The affix ṇ is added to the root an by the addition of the affix ṇic.

original: nyer bsgyur la zhes pa ci zhe na /🔽dh'a t'a / 'o na bashya ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: nyer bsgyur la zhes pa ci zhe na / dh'a t'a / 'o na bashya ci ltar zhe na /
translated: The affix ṇ is added to the root an by the addition of the affix ṇic.🔽The affix ṇ is added to the root an by the addition of the affix ṇic.🔽The affix ṇ is added to the root an by the addition of the affix ṇic.🔽The affix ṇ is added to the root an by the addition of the affix ṇic.🔽The affix ṇ is added to the root an by the addition of the affix ṇic.🔽The affix ṇ is added to the root an by the addition of the affix ṇic.🔽The affix ṇ is added to the root an by the addition of the affix ṇic.🔽The affix ṇ is added to the root an by the addition of the affix ṇic.🔽The affix ṇ is added to the root an by the addition of the affix ṇic.🔽The affix ṇ is added to the root an by the addition of the affix ṇic.🔽The affix ṇ is added to the root an by the addition of the affix ṇic.🔽The affix ṇ is added to the root an by the addition of the affix ṇic.🔽The affix ṇ is added to the root an by the addition of the affix ṇic.

original: kritya dang yuta rnams gzhan la yang ngo zhes pa'i tshig las so //
analyzed: kritya dang yuta rnams gzhan la yang ngo zhes pa'i tshig las so //
translated: The affix ṇ is added to the root an by the addition of the affix ṇic.🔽The affix ṇ is added to the root an by the addition of the affix ṇic

original: dzighra ta las ming la mi 'dod de /
analyzed: dzighra ta las ming la mi 'dod de /
translated: The name is not desired from jighra.

original: khyad par kun snol zhes byaghra:/
analyzed: khyad par kun snol zhes byaghra:/
translated: The special is called kusaṅgha.

original: nyer bsgyur la ni a'ata las ta'o //
analyzed: nyer bsgyur la ni a'ata las ta'o //
translated: In the prefix, there is ta from āt.

original: s'a dhi s'a hi sa ti tsi ti au de dzi bi di bha ri p'a ri lampi bandi rnams kyi nyer bsgyur med pa la'o //
analyzed: s'a dhi s'a hi sa ti tsi ti au de dzi bi di bha ri p'a ri lampi bandi rnams kyi nyer bsgyur med pa la'o //
translated: There is no prefix in sādhi, sāhi, sati, citi, eḍi, vid, bhari, pari, lampi, and vandhi.

original: s'a dha yang dag par grub par la'o //
analyzed: s'a dha yang dag par grub par la'o //
translated: Sādhi is for accomplishing.

original: sh'aha bzod pa la'o //
analyzed: sh'aha bzod pa la'o //
translated: Sāha is for patience.

original: sati mdo las 'byung ba'i byings so //
analyzed: sati mdo las 'byung ba'i byings so //
translated: Sati is a root that occurs in the sūtras.

original: tsi t'i shes pa la'o //
analyzed: tsi t'i shes pa la'o //
translated: Citi is for consciousness.

original: ae dzi g-yo ba la'o //
analyzed: ae dzi g-yo ba la'o //
translated: Eḍi is for moving.

original: aut sngon du'o //
analyzed: aut sngon du'o //
translated: Ūta is for before.

original: bi di thub bo yong pa'o //
analyzed: bi di thub bo yong pa'o //
translated: Vid is for able.

original: dhring brten pa la'o //🔽pa ri las yongs su rdzogs pa la'o //
analyzed: dhring brten pa la'o // pa ri las yongs su rdzogs pa la'o //
translated: Dhṛṅ is for support.🔽Pari is for completion.

original: pri skyong bar byed pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa dag la zhes pa yang na'o //
analyzed: pri skyong bar byed pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa dag la zhes pa yang na'o //
translated: Pri is for protecting and completing.

original: @273a * // lip nye bar byug pa la'o //
analyzed: @273a * // lip nye bar byug pa la'o //
translated: Lipi is for anointing.

original: bidli thob pa la'o //
analyzed: bidli thob pa la'o //
translated: Vidhi is for obtaining.

original: 'di dag mu tsa sogs nyid kyi phyir na yig a'a ga ma byas pa dag la /
analyzed: 'di dag mu tsa sogs nyid kyi phyir na yig a'a ga ma byas pa dag la /
translated: Since these have muci and so on, they are made with the prefix ā.

original: limpa / bandi zhes pa 'di dag rjes su 'brel pa dbyi'o //
analyzed: limpa / bandi zhes pa 'di dag rjes su 'brel pa dbyi'o //
translated: These are connected with the suffix iṇ.

original: s'a dhi la sogs pa 'di rnams kyi ain gyi mtha' can rnams dang lampi bandi zhes pa dag las kyang nyer bsgyur med par gyur pa la shang 'gyur ro //🔽sa dha ya:/ s'a ha ya:/
analyzed: s'a dhi la sogs pa 'di rnams kyi ain gyi mtha' can rnams dang lampi bandi zhes pa dag las kyang nyer bsgyur med par gyur pa la shang 'gyur ro // sa dha ya:/ s'a ha ya:/
translated: These sādhī, etc., have the ending iṇ, and also limp, bandhi, from which the prefix is changed to śaṅ.🔽sādhayati, sāhayati,

original: s'a ta ya:/ tse ta ya:/🔽au de dza ya:/
analyzed: s'a ta ya:/ tse ta ya:/ au de dza ya:/
translated: sātayati, cetati,🔽udījayati,

original: ba de ya:/ dh'a ra ya:/🔽p'a ra ya: limpa:/
analyzed: ba de ya:/ dh'a ra ya:/ p'a ra ya: limpa:/
translated: vadayati, dhārayati,🔽pārayati, limpati,🔽bandhati.

original: bandi:/ 'grub par byed du 'jug go //
analyzed: bandi:/ 'grub par byed du 'jug go //
translated: He causes to accomplish.

original: de bzhin du bzod du 'jug go //
analyzed: de bzhin du bzod du 'jug go //

original: yod du 'jug go //
analyzed: yod du 'jug go //

original: sems su 'jug go //
analyzed: sems su 'jug go //

original: shin tu g-yo ru 'jug go //
analyzed: shin tu g-yo ru 'jug go //
translated: He causes to move very much.

original: rig tu 'jug go //
analyzed: rig tu 'jug go //
translated: He causes to know.

original: brtan du 'jug go //
analyzed: brtan du 'jug go //
translated: He causes to be firm.

original: rdzogs su 'jug go zhes pa la ain na'o //
analyzed: rdzogs su 'jug go zhes pa la ain na'o //

original: p'a ra ti zhes pa 'di las tsur sogs nyid las aina'o //
analyzed: p'a ra ti zhes pa 'di las tsur sogs nyid las aina'o //
translated: From pārati, the suffix iṇ is added.

original: shanga'o // aanra bi ka ra na'o //
analyzed: shanga'o // aanra bi ka ra na'o //
translated: śaṅ, anvikaraṇa.

original: yon tan no //
analyzed: yon tan no //

original: li pi bi da dag la mutsa sogs las na yig a'a ga ma'o //
analyzed: li pi bi da dag la mutsa sogs las na yig a'a ga ma'o //

original: nyer bsgyur med pa zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: nyer bsgyur med pa zhes pa ci zhe na /

original: pra li pa:/ n'a mi au pa dh'a dang pr'i zhes pas ka'o //🔽d'a nya dhanya dag las yang na'o //
analyzed: pra li pa:/ n'a mi au pa dh'a dang pr'i zhes pas ka'o // d'a nya dhanya dag las yang na'o //

analyzed: d'anya dad dhanya dag las nyer bsgyur med par gyur pa la shang yang na 'gyur ro //

original: di hi li hi zhes pas na'i dmigs bsal lo //
analyzed: di hi li hi zhes pas na'i dmigs bsal lo //

original: da da:/ da dha:/
analyzed: da da:/ da dha:/
translated: dad, dadh,

original: du d'anya sbyin pa /
analyzed: du d'anya sbyin pa /
translated: dānya, dāna.

original: du dh'anya\/ aan bi ba ka ra na'o //
analyzed: du dh'anya\/ aan bi ba ka ra na'o //
translated: dhana, avibhakta.

original: dzu ho ti sogs las 'jig go //
analyzed: dzu ho ti sogs las 'jig go //

original: dzu ho ti sogs kyis gnyis brjod do //
analyzed: dzu ho ti sogs kyis gnyis brjod do //

analyzed: aa bhyasta rnams kyi a'a yig go zhes pas a'a dbyi'o //
translated: abhyastānām ā iti ādeśo bhavati.

original: phyogs gcig la /
analyzed: phyogs gcig la /

analyzed: d'aya:/ dhaya:/ dihi li hi zhes pas na'i rkyen no //
translated: dāy, dhay, dīhi līhi hii iti nādhikaraṇe.

original: nyer bsgyur med pa zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: nyer bsgyur med pa zhes pa ci zhe na /
translated: What is meant by the term “non-modified”?

original: pra da:/ pra dha:/
analyzed: pra da:/ pra dha:/
translated: prati, prath.

original: nyer bsgyur la ni a'ata las da'o zhes pas da'o //
analyzed: nyer bsgyur la ni a'ata las da'o zhes pas da'o //
translated: pratiśabdasya āt iti dā.

analyzed: dzva la sogs dang du dang ni dag las na yang na'o //
translated: jvālādiṣu ca dāni ca iti nā.

analyzed: dzva la la sogs pa nas brtsams nas ka pa 'gro ba la'o zhes pa 'di'i mthar thug pa rnams dang / du du nye bar gdung ba la'o //

analyzed: n'inya thob pa la'o zhes pa 'di dag las kyang nyer bsgyur med par gyur pa la na'i rkyen yang na 'gyur ro //

original: dzv'a la:/ dzva la:/
analyzed: dzv'a la:/ dzva la:/
translated: jvālā, jvālā,🔽cāla, cala,

original: ts'a la:/ tsal:/ phyogs gcig la aatsa'i rkyen no //
